A free cute hot pink, neon green, electric blue, and purple love owl theme! Love owls sit on branches under each of your texts as a beautiful heart tree is lightly displayed in the background. Custom made for Go SMS Pro. Matching Go Locker can be found here: http://goo.gl/2Rwm9 You may also like our other owl theme with different colors and different chat bubbles here: http://goo.gl/yqR98 ★ 3 FREE Matching Launcher Wallpapers Included > Tap App Icon > Tap Wallpaper Icon ✔ Custom made design from top to bottom ✔ Purple & pink heart wallpaper background ✔ Purple stripes on the top and bottom of the chat screen ✔ 2 owl characters for profile icons ✔ Cute matching popup chat window ✔ 2 crisp chat bubbles, one purple owl character, one pink owl character ✔ 2 different custom backgrounds for messaging and conversation views ✔ Customized text colors for all GO SMS screens ✔ 33 rounded purple and blue gleaming application icons to match the theme ✔ This theme is designed to be completely cute and awesome but still make it easy to read your messages, enjoy! ✔ Beautiful owl graphics originally created by Dilek Design Studio at MyGrafico: http://goo.gl/au6os ✔ Theme can be stored on your SD Card About Go SMS Pro: GO SMS PRO brings you cool UI, fast and convenient SMS/MMS experience. GO SMS Pro is the most popular messaging app; Very powerful, Cool, Funny, Safe, Fully customizable; Well support SMS/MMS + GO Chat(free message) + Walkie Talkie(free voice). MUST HAVE. Search GO SMS, install it if you don't have have it. Then... To apply theme: Tap App Icon > Tap Set Theme > Tap LOCAL > Apply > Love Owls Theme Purple GO SMS Changing Fonts/Sizes: Open GO SMS Pro > press Menu > Settings > Appearance Settings > Scan Font Packages After the scan is complete go to > Conversation Customization > Change the Incoming Font > Change the Outgoing Font. Look for "LoveOwls" font name. You can do the same for under Conversation List & Popup Window Customization under Settings. It’s easy once you find where all the settings are! If you enjoy the theme let me know in the ratings, thank you! I wanted to create free themes for everyone to enjoy. In order to offer this for free and keep designing even more free themes, I have no other option but to show ads. We've carefully placed them so they don't interfere with your theme. To help offset the ads, I've also included 3 FREE Matching Launcher Wallpapers. To apply > Tap App Icon > Tap Wallpaper Icon *** Any problems, feedback, or requests just email support@jellytap.com , we like hearing from the people using our themes! *** Thanks for your interest in our designs!

A nice addiction if you alread have the Nature v2 theme for GO Launcher EX and GO SMS PRO. Now I released the same theme for GOContacts EX. .-=[ MATCHING THEMES AVAILABLE FOR ]=-. - GO Launcher EX - NEXT Launcher - GO SMS PRO - GO LOcker - Skinnable Calculator You can find the matching themes in my other APPs in Android Market. .-=[ REQUIREMENTS ]=-. Needs latest version of GO Contacts EX installed to apply the theme. This APP is free and available throught Android Market. If your phone is using Android JELLY BEAN , please contact me by email for a solution . .-=[ APP2SD CARD ]=-. Yes. Must have Android OS 2.2 (Froyo) or Up. .-=[ APPLYING THE THEME ]=-. 1) In GO Contacts EX press the phone menu button; 2) Select the THEME option; 3) From the Theme listing select the theme you´ve just download and installed; .-=[ MORE FROM DEVELOPER ]=-. Click on my Name profile to view all my Android APPs available. .-=[ CUSTOMMER SUPPORT ]=-. If you need any help with this APP or wish to contact me, send me an email. I try to reply emails daily, if not possible I´ll reply in no more than 48hs. I do not reply emails in weekends, emails are replied from Monday - Friday. .-=[ ABOUT REFUNDS ]=-. Refunds are available for 15 minutes, if you wish to cancel the order do it during this time. If this is a free theme or APP you can cancel and try again several times. If it´s a paid application and you cancel it, the second time you order it no refund will be available. .-=[ DOWNLOADS ARE NOT COMPLETING? ]=-. Please, sometimes the Android Market servers becomes really slow with so many requests, if this happen you can try another time. I have no control over this issue. Some patience is required when it happens. .-=[ COMMENTS AND RATINGS ]=-. To help other customers, your comments and ratings are welcome and I apreciate it. Also, if you need any assistance, please contact me first before posting offensive comments. It´s better to have a help from a developer than avoid him and leaving negative public feedbacks. .-=[ UPDATES ]=-. All my themes are updated on a regular base to improve the theme with new features like more icons, wallpapers, etc. Requests for new icons are welcome.

Welcome to the Word Search definitive game !!! You can solve all the available challenges or play customizable games with infinite combinations. The game has many configuration options (colors, fonts, difficulty, ...) to suit the way you play. All games are automatically saved, so you can take it up at any time and after continue playing the same game. ♥ Now available the new online version: http://goo.gl/vlIlz0 ★ Unique Features ★ - Play via Bluetooth with another person - Adventure endless world - Custom-worlds puzzles - Share the puzzles via Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, e-mail, etc.. Shared as a jpg image - Original Game Modes: Image Search, questions, sayings, etc.. - Challenges, achievements and statistics. - Infinite generator of Word Search games. - Advanced Customization. ★ Challenges ★ There are 12 categories of challenges, the difficulty is increased. Once you get to solve a challenge you can continue to the next one. Of course, you can replay every challenge whenever you want. This way you can keep improving your best times. There is also a statistics and achievements section where you can see all of your progress in the game. ★ Customized games ★ You can design your own Word Search game, setting: the category of words, the size, the density of words and the difficulty to "hide" the words. ★ Game modes ★ * Words: The traditional playmode. Just find all the words from the list in the shortest time possible. * Images: You have to find the words from the images given. * Phrases: A series of phrases are shown, with some highlighted words, which have to be found. * Questions: The hardest mode, because from a given definition you must figure out the answer and find it. It's a challenge. * Numbers: Find sequences of numbers * Gems search: Find the gems and diamonds in the same bunch. ★ Customization ★ You can customize many features of the game (in the settings option): * You can change the name of the player or its image (avatar). In the future it will be used to compare your scores with those of other players. * Play sounds or not. * The background color. * Type and font size. * Disable animations. * Show or not grid lines. Just one more thing... ENJOY IT !!! -------------------- _Legal notice This application complies with the policies of Google Play content. This app is created just for the purpose of entertainment, its free and supported only by advertising. Any suggestion or bug report is welcome. Please, before writing a bad review contact us by email at jdpapps@gmail.com Permissions required : - INTERNET : To show the advertising banners (Google AdMob and Chartboost) - BLUETOOTH : For two player games. - SD ACCESS : To share Word Search games with your contacts (near future release) Translations: (Any help to improve existing translations or create new language translations is welcome)
release_text: ♥ Good news! 1.000.000 downloads. THANKS YOU ALL! ◉ Many graphics and interface improvements. ◉ Bugfixes and words typos ◉ Three new typefonts for word search puzzles ◉ Added EU cookie consent dialog (required by regulations). Please, before writing a bad review contact us by email at jdpapps@gmail.com

description: Enjoy playing Euchre against three challenging computer opponents. The computer AI is highly advanced and will surely give you a run for your money! New high resolution graphics will shine on your newer devices! Game options include Stick the Dealer, Autoplay, Going Under, Canadian Loner, Statistics, Previous Hand History and customizable opponent play styles. You can play to 5, 7, 10, 11, 15 or 21 points. Computer names can be customized as well. If you don't like how the game plays, be sure to check out the game settings. The computer players can be configured how you want them! And one final note, the computer does not cheat nor does it have knowledge of its partner's cards! Euchre comes down to whomever makes the call, so be aggressive!

"Conversation master PRO version!! This is a useful language learning app with various situational QnA styled expressions for daily conversation. You can learn many expressions to speak in real situations. Now you have a huge confidence to talk with foreigners in restaurant, street and a trip abroad. This contains 30,000+ expressions for daily situations with native voice data. Today’s Talk notification shows you each expression per a day for you to learn and listen to those expressions one by one. You can enjoy learning languages with native speaker’s voice like to talk with real native speakers. 1. Image training is a good way to learn a language!! Conversation Master helps you to train yourself with indirect experiences for many situations in your daily life. This increases efficiency of your learning with helping to imagine you were in the situations. It is important to do image training repeatedly about daily conversation with the situations in business, restaurant, and hotel etc. 2. Interpretation function Interpretation available immediately through voice recognition 3. Listening and repeated learning is also good for learning a language!! Conversation Master makes you learn as you see and listen to the expressions. It is important to listen to the expressions repeatedly with ‘Repeat all’ and ‘Listen all’ features while your free time. For example when you go to and off from your work/school or a few minutes before you sleep and so on. 4. Have challenge to a new language life!! Conversation Master is launched with 10 languages of Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, French, German, Spanish, Thai, Indonesian, and Vietnamese. So you may learn and experience various language expressions. Have a challenge to a new language life of various languages without hesitation. # Conversation Master is produced by a professional language contents provider TIMESPACESYSTEM. This app is based on TIMESPACESYSTEM‘s best seller products with handpicked expressions and native voice data. Main Features *Native speaker’s Voice data *30,000+ expressions in 12 Categories *Replaceable words in expressions *Interpretation function *Save recent translation function *Today's talk notification *QnA styled contents *Listen all, Repeat all *Send contents by email and SMS *Voice Search ※ Notice ※ This app provides its limited contents only in the free version and supports the In App Purchase (IAP) of the App Store. If you want to use the all contents of it, you have to purchase the full version."

Going shopping ? If you use pen and paper everytime to jot down the list of items to buy, this app will be perfect for you. This shopping checklist or list app comes pre-loaded with 410+ grocery and drug store related items that you can customize any way you want. With options to add/edit/delete/copy/move/rearrange and duplicate you can quickly create your own customized shopping or grocery list. You can also create your list on your computer and import it back into the app. Use the app everytime you go shopping. Uncheck all items before shopping and check them off as you complete them. Keep re-using the list over and over. Need different lists for different stores - No Problem.. The app supports UNLIMITED lists. Just duplicate your existing list and create another customized list. PLEASE NOTE: All the features listed in the description are INCLUDED with the purchase. The in-app purchase option is used only if you want to purchase additional templates (in addition to grocery shopping list). The app does NOT need internet connection. Your privacy is guaranteed. We back our app with 100% refund ANYTIME beyond the refund window. If you are not satisfied for any reason, just send us an email. Want to share your list with friends or family? No Problem. Just e-mail them your list. New Features! - Tablet support. Quick navigation - just swipe right to reveal the left pane. "Quick add" features. You can add notes, quantity and an additional measurement. Auto sort ability. Checkout more features below. Features include: - Tablet support. - Quick navigation. For small screen devices, just swipe right to reveal the left pane. - Create new lists from factory templates in minutes. - Add/Edit or delete lists/items/categories. - Quickly add item or category from the same screen with the "Quick Add" feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and an additional measurement (weight/volume/temperature etc) for each item. - Hide/Unhide checked items, move checked to bottom/top. - Ability to delete all checked items. - "Add After This" or "Add Before This" option to insert items wherever you want and quickly. - Password protect from prying eyes. - Option to check all/uncheck all so you can reuse the list again. - Copy or Move between lists, categories and items. Quickly creates your own personal list in matter of minutes. - Auto Sort either in ascending or descending order. - Rearrange items/categories/lists using drag/drop. - Indicates the total number of items and the number of items that need to be completed. - Color coded (green, yellow and red) for a visually appealing presentation - Export/Backup all lists to external storage and import them back when needed. - Edit your list on your computer and import it back. - Easily email with your friends / family using any sharing client you have on your device. - Send and share via Bluetooth to any bluetooth enabled device - Easily send to your printer (via email - Needs email to print support on your printer)
release_text: - Option to purchase more templates. - Tablet support. Swipe right to reveal left pane. - Action Bar for all menu options. - Auto Sort options. - Drag/Drop for rearranging. - Quick Add feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and addt'l measurement for each item. - Multiple Checked item options - Move items to bottom/top, show all, hide checked - Delete All checked items.

description: Speed a card game also known as Spit or Slam, is very fast-paced game and it could result in damage to the cards -- so play this on your device and don't ruin your actual playing cards. Speed is a game for two players of the shedding family of card games, in which each player tries to get rid of all of his cards. Speed is a game associated with the game Nertz. Controls: Tap or Drag the cards Objective: To play all your cards first. How to Play: -Each player is dealt five cards to form a hand, and each player is dealt 15 cards face down to form a draw pile. If you are playing with jokers, you use them as wild cards and give each draw pile 16 cards. A stack of five cards, placed face down on each side between the players, serves as a replacement pile. Finally, two cards are placed face down in the center between the replacement piles. -You may play a card in your hand by discarding it in the "Play Pile" if the card is 1 number/value higher or lower. (e.g. 5 can be played on a 6 or 4, a Queen can be played on a King or Jack) -A 2 may be played on an Ace and a Ace may be played on a 2. -You may have up to 5 cards in your hand at a single time. When you have less than 5 cards in your hand you may draw from your "Draw Pile" -First player to play all of his/her cards wins!

However the benefits go far beyond easy weight loss and calorie control as fasting also improves body detox, reduces appetite and even increases energy levels. Get a healthier lifestyle NOW! Features include: - Weekly fasting planner with notifications to help you manage your fasting routine - Visual displays to help monitor your current fast - Eating window reminder to insure your calories are met - Tracking feature to record calorie intake, body fat percentage and weight - Progress feature to keep track of previous fasts, weights and calorie intake - Calculators including body fat percentage and maintenance calories - In depth guide to Intermittent Fasting including over 1400 words of advice, tips and tricks! Exercise your brain in this superb Maze puzzle game! Maze-A-Maze Labyrinth Puzzles is an amazing labyrinth puzzle game featuring realistic physics and fun gameplay with numerous challenging stages that get tougher as you progress the game. It is a beautiful casual game with challenging time-limited maze puzzles. Collect stars and complete each maze puzzle by moving the ball to the minotaur (black dot). Complete the level in the shortest time to gain a higher score! Use your mobile device's accelerometer based tilt controls or touch based Joystick to control the the ball to the minotaur in the maze puzzle. The difficulty level of each maze puzzle increases with every level. The game gets very hard after the initial levels, be prepared to encounter ultimate puzzles that are crazy hard and scary. These levels will require your concentration, focus and precision in tilting and controlling the ball. This version comes with 30 stages of fun and challenging maze puzzles. With Google Play Game Services, you can now compare your scores against your friends and climb up the leaderboards. Unlock achievements as your progress in the game. Collect all the 3 stars in every level to unlock additional achievements! Levels 1-10 : A set of simple physics based puzzles to get you started playing the game. A few levels have moving blocks that require you to time the way you move the ball. You should be able to complete these levels with ease. Levels 11-20 : Introducing Red areas! You need to manoeuvre the ball with precision in these levels. Touching the red areas reset you to the starting position. These levels are more challenging, puzzling and will test your patience. You will surely feel a sense of achievement once you complete these levels. Levels 21-30 : Introducing bullet sprayers, controllable blocks, exploding blocks and more! These levels are tougher than the previous levels and require you to have a strategy to complete each level. These puzzles also truly challenge your patience and concentration and are sure to blow your mind. Like us on facebook for news/updates: http://www.facebook.com/jsplashapps Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/jsplashapps The next update will contain more challenging mazes with new gameplay features. So please support us by recommending Maze-A-Maze Labyrinth Puzzles to your friends and by leaving a positive review.

Android version of Pocket Ghost paranormal detector. Subsonic (infrasound), supersonic and audible IIR filters calculate the ParaNormal Quotient(PNQ) at your location. The magnetic field is also displayed. An essential tool for the aspiring or professional ghost hunter! Theory of Operation (Only for nerds) ... It has been reported that paranormal activity is evidenced by sounds inaudible, or barely audible, to the human ear. Animals, whose hearing is more acute at higher frequencies than ours, are able to detect supersonic sounds, generally above 12-15 kiloHertz or so. For example, dogs are reported to behave oddly during supernatural events. Sounds of very low frequency, less than a hundred Hertz or so, are normally felt rather than heard by humans. The built-in microphone circuitry in most handheld devices is designed to detect frequencies in the audio range, but there is some residual response from the circuitry at the very low (subsonic) and very high (supersonic) frequencies. Ghostroid uses fast software-based Infinite Impulse Response (IIR) filters to measure the level of sub- and super-sonic sound pressure waves arriving at the microphone. It also measures the audible sound level. The three ranges are shown on the Ghostroid display via three meters, which move dynamically and are updated several times a second. The Para Normal Quotient (PNQ) is calculated from a formula that sums the sound levels in the sub- and super- sonic ranges, and subtracts the audible range value. This yields a number which increases as the sub- and super- frequencies (which are difficult or impossible for us to hear) increase, as compared to the audible frequencies. The PNQ value is shown by a set of concentric bands at the centre of the display. High PNQ values may be caused by a variety of events: Low frequency rumbling (e.g. from heavy trucks or machinery), High frequency noises (e.g. dog whistles, or keys jangling) as well as Supernatural phenomena (please don't drop your Android when you run away in fright!) Ghostroid is a port to Android of the well-established "Pocket Ghost" application for Windows Mobile. Although I personally remain sceptical about the existence of paranormal activity, and the effectiveness of this application to detect it, I have received several reports over the years of Pocket Ghost being successfully used by paranormal investigators. Here are a couple of quotes: 1) "I have used the pocket ghost program on my I-mate Jasjam and in all cases the Sub-sonic and Super-sonic reading peaked at 85 to 90 and did not drop down until the visions (or what ever they were) had gone." 2) "I have seen your program successfully used by a professional parapsychologist during an investigation in London." 3) "I am a member of several paranormal groups and investigate the most paranormally active sites within the U.K. On one such investigation a parapsychologist was using your 'Pocket Ghost' to great effect."

description: Teen Patti online – Flash Card Game by Junglee Games is India's twist on 3 card poker. Teen Patti, also known as Indian Poker, Flush, Flash or 3 card Brag, is a popular card game played in many parts of the world. Players bet based on the strength of their cards and the one with the strongest hand wins the pot. We have daily, weekly and monthly promotions - Take part in teen patti gold sweepstakes and win golden cards, smartphones and other fabulous rewards! Don’t miss to join the exciting leaderboard chase – Lead the race with your octro teen patti speed and grab awesome prizes! You may love Bridge, Rummy, or Matka, but Teenpatti game is still the king! And Junglee Teen Patti is the best free online card game that allows you to play free Teen Patti with real players from all over the world. Challenge your friends to the most exciting social Indian poker game for Free! Choose your table, take a seat, send gifts and chat with your friends while cleaning up the pool/kitty. Players bet based on the strength of their cards and the one with the strongest hand wins the pool/kitty. The chips in the game have no real cash value. If your chips get consumed fully, you can buy more to play teen patti for a longer period of time. The game is also known as Teenpatti, teen pathi, 3 patti, teen pati, flash & flush card game. The objective of the game is to have the best 3-card poker hand and to maximize the pool/kitty before the showdown. The cards are ranked as follows (From High to low): 1. Trail (three of a kind): Three cards of the same rank. 2. Pure Sequence (Straight Flush): Three consecutive cards of the same suit. 3. Sequence (Straight): Three consecutive cards not all in the same suit. 4. Color (Flush): Three cards of the same suit that are not in sequence. 5. Pair (two of a kind): Two cards of the same rank. 6. High Card: A hand of three cards which is not a pair, sequence, flush, trail or pure. The best high card hand in teen patti would be AKJ You can play the game with fabulous avatars in a casino-like gaming environment which is completely loaded with interactive features and game buttons like Blind, Chaal, Show and others. Invite your friends and challenge them in Teen Patti - raise the ante, trap them with sets, call their bluffs and have unlimited fun! You can bet strategically with your seen cards or test your luck by playing blind. The choice is all yours. Play in Teen Patti Bollywood style and have great fun! Some of the key features loaded with Junglee Teen Patti App are: ♥ Range of Game Avatars ♥ First Person Game View ♥ Faster Gameplay ♥ Daily Bonus Credit ♥ Fixed Limit Tables ♥ No Limit Tables ♥ Exchange Gift Shops ♥ Live In-game Chat ♥ Easy Gaming Interface Friends Invitation & lots more. It's a fast, simple and quick card game for your Android device. Download and play Junglee Teen Patti Anytime, Anywhere for FREE.

description: Type faster than ever before! Sweep words with both fingers twice as fast as Swype or SlideIT. Android Police: "A very interesting take on mobile input... give it a shot". El androide libre: "A keyboard revolution". The Guardian: "Is there room for another big third-party Android keyboard besides SwiftKey and Swype?". Available in English, Hebrew, Spanish, Italian, French and German. HOW TO USE A video is worth 10,000 words so check it out to see how Keymonk works. COMPATIBILITY Keymonk was tested on Galaxy S2 and should work with any compliant text editor on any smartphone with good multi-touch support. MULTITOUCH ISSUES Some devices, including high-end devices, have defective multi-touch support. If you see the Keymonk touch indication circles flicker or change colors while sweeping with both fingers, that may be an indication that your device does not support multi-touch well. Keep each finger at its side of the keyboard and avoid bumping them into one another since it might confuse the touch screen. EDITOR COMPATIBILITY Keymonk might not work with particular text editors that are not compliant with the Android API. If you experience problems please send an email to feedback@keymonk.com . SEND FEEDBACK Help me improve this software by sending feedback and error reports to feedback@keymonk.com PRIVACY Keymonk respects your privacy and does not collect any of your data.

description: détaillée des 3 exercices - Docteur Dominique Servant / Docteur Christophe André 3 tests d’auto-évaluation avec résultats, interprétations et suivi - Savez-vous vous relaxer ? (10 questions) - Etes-vous d’un naturel anxieux ? (18 questions) - Etes-vous d’un naturel stressé ? (22 questions) Un apprentissage personnalisable 6 diaporamas photos en complément 6 thèmes musicaux en accompagnement En résumé Notre application de pleine conscience Se préparer aux épreuves va vous aider à aborder vos difficultés psychologiques et vos problèmes physiques différemment, sans forcément chercher à les supprimer ou à vouloir les fuir. Par la pratique de la pleine conscience, vous allez suspendre vos manières habituelles d’entrer en relation avec ces expériences négatives en les dépouillant de tout jugement et de toute attente. Au lieu de ruminer et de ressasser inutilement vos préoccupations, vos épreuves, votre détresse, vos malheurs, vous apprenez à les visiter et les intégrer à ce que vous êtes en train de ressentir. En travaillant avec un mode mental différent - comme rester présent au souffle, à toute pensée, aux émotions, aux sensations dont vous devenez de plus en plus conscient - vous allez développer des capacités d’acceptation et d’observation face à vos maux de l’âme, de l’esprit ou du corps. L’instant présent vous sert de refuge pour éviter d’être dans des projections, des anticipations inquiètes. Vous constatez alors que votre façon de percevoir ou de vous représenter les choses et les évènements changent : l’acceptation au lieu du déni, l’accueil au lieu du refus. Bénéfices La pratique régulière de notre application Se préparer aux épreuves va vous apporter les bénéfices suivants : - Aménager un espace personnel de détente et de liaison avec vous-même, en étant attentif à votre respiration. - Devenir plus conscient des sensations/perceptions corporelles, des sentiments et des pensées, moment après moment. - Réagir différemment face aux situations générant du stress, prendre du recul par rapport au monde et aux stimuli quotidiens. - Savoir revenir sur le présent lorsque votre esprit naturellement vagabonde. - Prévenir l’installation de pensées négatives, modifier votre relation aux pensées, pour que vous n’en dépendiez plus mais que vous soyez en relation avec elles, comme objet de votre attention. - Observer et prendre conscience de vos tensions en les acceptant et introduire le lien entre une pensée et une réponse émotionnelle et corporelle. Auteurs & collaboration scientifique Docteur Dominique Servant Médecin psychiatre et psychothérapeute, le docteur Dominique Servant dirige l’unité spécialisée Stress Anxiété au CHRU de Lille. Considéré comme l’un des meilleurs spécialistes français du stress et de l’anxiété, il utilise la relaxation depuis 15 ans au CHU de Lille. Il est l’auteur de : - Relaxation : nouvelles approches, nouvelles pratiques (Masson) - Relaxation et Méditation. Trouver son équilibre émotionnel (Odile Jacob). Docteur Christophe André Médecin psychiatre et psychothérapeute, attaché à l’hôpital Saint Anne à Paris, le docteur Christophe André est l’auteur de nombreux ouvrages qui ont obtenu un très grand succès auprès du public : - Méditer, jour après jour (L’Iconoclaste) - Sérénité, 25 histoires d’équilibre intérieur (Odile Jacob) 2 years of self-help therapy: 19 minutes accompanying I overcome the stressful thoughts - 9mn18 I overcome the pain - 9mn37 4 videos to understand the technical - What is mindfulness meditation? - How to practice mindfulness meditation? - Benefits of mindfulness meditation - Overcoming obstacles 4 records to master board - Preparing for tests - Recommendations and benefits of the practice - Detailed description of the 3 years - Dr Dominique Servant / Doctor Christophe André 3 self-assessment tests results, interpretations and monitoring - Do you relax? (10 questions) - Are you a natural anxiety? (18 questions) - Are you a stressed natural? (22 questions) Customizable learning 6 photo slideshows in addition 6 musical themes accompanying In brief Our application of mindfulness Preparing for tests will help you to address your psychological problems and your physical problems differently, without necessarily seeking to remove or to want to flee. Through the practice of mindfulness, you will suspend your habitual ways of relating with these negative experiences in stripping them of any judgment and expectations. Instead of ruminating and unnecessary rehashing your concerns, events, your distress, your troubles, you get to visit and integrate what you're feeling. Working with a different mental fashion - like staying present in breath, every thought, emotions, sensations that you become more aware - you will develop acceptance and observation capabilities to your face the pain soul, mind or body. The moment serves as a refuge to avoid being in projections, expectations worried. Then you find that the way you think or you represent things and events change: acceptance instead of denial, refusal home instead. Earnings The regular practice of our application Preparing for tests will bring you the following benefits: - Develop a personal relaxation and connecting with yourself, paying attention to your breathing. - Become more aware of the sensations / bodily perceptions, feelings and thoughts, time after time. - React differently to situations that generate stress, take a step back from the world and everyday stimuli. - Read back to the present when your mind wanders naturally. - Prevent the installation of negative thoughts, change your relationship to thoughts, so that you do more but were dependent you are in relationship with them, as the object of your attention. - Observe and become aware of your tension by accepting and introducing the link between thinking and emotional and physical response. Authors & scientific collaboration Dr. Dominique Servant Psychiatrist and psychotherapist, Dr. Dominique Servant directs specialized Stress Anxiety at the University Hospital of Lille unit. Considered one of the best French specialists stress and anxiety, it uses the relaxation for 15 years at the University Hospital of Lille. He is the author of: - Relaxation: new approaches, new practices (Masson) - Relaxation and Meditation. Finding emotional balance (Odile Jacob). Dr. Christophe André Psychiatrist and psychotherapist, attached to the Saint Anne Hospital in Paris, Dr. Christophe André is the author of many books that have obtained a great success with the public: - Meditate every day (The Iconoclast) - Serenity, 25 stories of inner balance (Odile Jacob)

3 exercices de self-help thérapie : 41 minutes d’accompagnement Je me recentre - 11mn47 Je m'accorde avec mon projet - 15mn29 Je retrouve l'harmonie - 14mn30 Des conseils pratiques pour agir au quotidien 4 vidéos pour comprendre les techniques : - La Sophrologie - Les Bénéfices - Les Conseils - Dynamiser sa journée Nos recommandations pour être efficace : - Résumé - Conseils - Bénéfices 3 tests d’auto-évaluation avec résultats, interprétations et suivi : - Savez-vous vous relaxer ? (20 questions) - Etes-vous d’un naturel anxieux ? (20 questions) - Etes-vous d’un naturel stressé ? (20 questions) Un apprentissage personnalisable 6 diaporamas photos en complément 6 thèmes musicaux en accompagnement En résumé Notre application de sophrologie Trouver l’harmonie avec soi-même va vous aider à développer un sentiment de paix et d’équilibre à vous-même mais aussi aux autres. Nos exercices vont vous servir à mettre en place vos programmes positifs, à développer une cohérence à vos choix de vie, une adéquation à vos champs de valeurs. En parcourant le chemin des expériences, des émotions et des comportements, vous en prenez mieux conscience, vous les actualisez et les réorienter selon vos besoins et vos projets. Ainsi présent à vous, sans porter aucun jugement moral, vous apprenez à vous connaître et à vous contenter pour vous responsabiliser, y compris par rapport à votre environnement. Pour pouvoir être en harmonie avec soi-même, il vous faut également développer un sentiment d’harmonie durable aux autres : être capable de donner sociablement, choisir des personnes qui vous conviennent, s’ajuster dans une identification consciente et réfléchie aux autres Ainsi, réconcilié avec vous-même et avec les autres, vous développez l'indispensable estime de vous qui libère toute votre énergie et vous exprimez mieux votre identité pour mieux vous accorder avec vos projets. Objectifs - Se recentrer sur le présent et savoir prendre du temps pour soi - Découvrir ses sensations corporelles – révélées par chaque pratique -, les accueillir et se relier à ses propres impressions. - Faire confiance à la sagesse de son corps pour élargir le champ de conscience de sa réalité et son équilibre Corps-Esprit. - Apprendre à chaque pratique à recueillir et mobiliser les sensations positives de l’expérience en atteignant le niveau sophro-liminal (défini en sophrologie comme un état entre veille et sommeil). Apprentissage personnalisable Accessible à tous et personnalisable, notre application Trouver l’harmonie avec soi-même permet d’aménager votre propre programme de sophrologie en écoutant et en suivant les recommandations des Docteurs Dominique Servant et Marc Hay, au travers de vidéos pour comprendre la sophrologie, de conseils pratiques pour agir au quotidien, de diaporamas photos et d’accompagnements musicaux. Nos différents tests d’auto-évaluation facilitent votre apprentissage progressif et le suivi de vos progrès. Loin d’être une perte de temps, Trouver l’harmonie avec soi-même vous aide à être plus en phase avec vous-même au quotidien. Auteurs & collaboration scientifique Docteur Marc Hay Docteur en médecine, psychothérapeute et sophrologue, le docteur Marc Hay est co-responsable de l’enseignement du Diplôme d’Université (DU) de Sophrologie à l’Université de Lille 2. Chargé de cours dans l’enseignement du Diplôme Universitaire Stress Anxiété à l’université de Lille 2, il intervient également comme praticien attaché dans l’unité spécialisé Stress et Anxiété du CHRU de Lille Mr Christian Decottignies Sophrologue, psychopraticien et kinésithérapeute, Christian Decottignies exerce dans le champ des thérapies psycho-corporelles et transpersonnelles. Il est également co-responsable de l’enseignement du Diplôme d’Université de Sophrologie à Lille 2. 3 exercises self-help therapy: 41 minutes accompanying I refocused - 11mn47 I agree with my project - 15mn29 I find harmony - 14mn30 Practical advice for daily action 4 videos to understand the techniques: - The Sophrologie - The Benefits - The Boards - Boosting the day Our recommendations to be effective: - Summary - Tips - Benefits 3 tests for self-assessment findings, interpretations and monitoring: - Do you relax? (20 questions) - Are you a natural anxiety? (20 questions) - Are you a stressed natural? (20 questions) Customizable learning 6 photo slideshows in addition 6 musical themes accompanying In brief Our application sophrologie Find harmony with yourself will help you develop a sense of peace and balance to yourself but also to others. Our exercises will be used to set up your positive programs to develop consistency in your life choices, a match for your value fields. Taking the path experiences, emotions and behaviors, you better become aware, you refresh and redirect according to your needs and projects. So now you, without wearing any moral judgment, you get to know you and satisfy you to empower yourself, including in relation to your environment. To be in harmony with yourself, you also need to develop a sense of lasting harmony of others: being able to give sociably, choose people who suit you, fit into a conscious identification and thoughtful to others And reconciled with yourself and with others, you develop the necessary self-freeing you all your energy and you better express your identity to better match you with your projects. Objectives - Refocusing on this and know how to take time for yourself - Discover bodily sensations - revealed by each practice - welcome and connect with their own impressions. - Trusting the wisdom of his body to broaden the scope of understanding of the reality and balance Body Spirit. - Learn to each practice to collect and mobilize the positive feelings experienced in reaching sophro-liminal level (defined as a relaxation therapy state between waking and sleeping). Customizable learning Accessible and customizable, our application Find harmony with oneself allows you to arrange your own program sophrologie listening and following the recommendations of Drs Dominique Servant and Marc Hay, through videos include relaxation therapy, to practical advice to act in daily life, photo slideshows and musical accompaniments. Our various self-assessment tests facilitate your learning and progressive track your progress. Far from being a waste of time, Find harmony with yourself helps you to be more in tune with yourself everyday. Authors & scientific collaboration Dr. Mark Hay Medical doctor, psychotherapist and relaxation therapist, Dr. Mark Hay is co-responsible for the teaching of University Diploma (DU) Sophrologie at the University of Lille 2. Lecturer in Education University Diploma Stress Anxiety at the University of Lille 2, it also acts as attached practitioner specializing in Stress and Anxiety unit of University Hospital of Lille Mr Christian Decottignies Sophrologue, clinical psychologist and physiotherapist, Christian Decottignies exercises in the field of psycho-physical and transpersonal therapies. He is also co-responsible for teaching the Diploma of University of Lille 2 Sophrologie.

détaillée des 4 exercices - Docteur Dominique Servant 3 tests d’auto-évaluation avec résultats, interprétations et suivi : - Savez-vous vous relaxer ? (10 questions) - Etes-vous d’un naturel anxieux ? (18 questions) - Etes-vous d’un naturel stressé ? (22 questions) Un apprentissage personnalisable 6 diaporamas photos en complément 6 thèmes musicaux en accompagnement En résumé Notre application d’initiation à méditation de pleine conscience Se libérer des pensées parasites est accessible à tous et se révèle un moyen efficace pour prendre de la distance avec les pensées parasites et les sensations désagréables, alors que le raisonnement s'avère peu efficace. À partir de trois types d'exercices de base, vous pourrez utiliser efficacement la méditation de pleine conscience : la centration sur la respiration, la centration sur le corps par le balayage corporel et la centration sur des activités quotidiennes. En ces différentes techniques, vous pourrez vous centrer sur vos pensées, vos sensations et ainsi explorer des sentiments et des émotions dont vous n'êtes pas toujours conscient. Ces exercices sont courts et peuvent être pratiqués dans de nombreuses situations de la vie de tous les jours. Seuls impératifs, pour être efficaces, ils doivent être répétés régulièrement. La méditation de pleine conscience est une technique complètement adaptée à la relaxation moderne et qui est très efficace dans de nombreux problèmes comme le stress, l'anxiété et la dépression, dans lesquels les pensées et les émotions jouent un rôle crucial. Bénéfices La pratique régulière de notre application Se libérer des pensées négatives va vous apporter les bénéfices suivants : - Devenir plus conscient des sensations corporelles, des sentiments et des pensées, moment après moment. - Prendre du recul par rapport au monde et aux désagréments quotidiens. - Savoir revenir sur le présent lorsque votre esprit naturellement vagabonde. - Modifier votre relation aux pensées négatives, pour que vous n’en dépendiez plus mais que vous soyez en relation avec elles, comme objet de votre attention. Apprentissage personnalisable Accessible à tous et personnalisable, notre application Se libérer des pensées négatives permet d’aménager votre propre programme de pleine conscience en écoutant et en suivant les recommandations du docteur Dominique Servant, au travers de vidéos pour comprendre la méditation de pleine conscience, de conseils pratiques pour agir au quotidien, de diaporamas photos et d’accompagnements musicaux. Nos différents tests d’auto-évaluation facilitent votre apprentissage progressif et le suivi de vos progrès. Loin d’être une perte de temps, Se libérer des pensées négatives vous aide à être plus en phase avec vous-même au quotidien. Auteur & collaboration scientifique Docteur Dominique Servant Médecin psychiatre et psychothérapeute, le docteur Dominique Servant dirige l’unité spécialisée Stress Anxiété au CHRU de Lille. Le docteur Servant est l’un des meilleurs spécialistes français du stress et de l’anxiété et il utilise la relaxation depuis 15 ans au CHU de Lille. Il est l’auteur de : - Relaxation : nouvelles approches, nouvelles pratiques (Masson). - Relaxation et Méditation. Trouver son équilibre émotionnel (Odile Jacob). - Soigner le stress et l’anxiété par soi-même (Odile Jacob). 4 exercises self-help therapy: 34 minutes accompanying I focus on the present moment - 6mn39 I focus on the act of eating - 7mn09 I am aware of my body - 7mn46 I learn mindfulness - 12mn01 Practical advice for daily action 3 videos to understand the technique: - What is mindfulness meditation? - How to practice mindfulness meditation? - Benefits of mindfulness meditation 4 records council to master: - To release negative thoughts - Recommendations and benefits of the practice - Detailed description of the 4 years - Dr Dominique Servant 3 tests for self-assessment findings, interpretations and monitoring: - Do you relax? (10 questions) - Are you a natural anxiety? (18 questions) - Are you a stressed natural? (22 questions) Customizable learning 6 photo slideshows in addition 6 musical themes accompanying In brief Our application introductory mindfulness meditation Freedom from extraneous thoughts is accessible to all and proves an effective way to take distance with extraneous thoughts and unpleasant sensations, while reasoning is ineffective. From three types of basic exercises, you can effectively use mindfulness meditation: centration on breathing, centering on the body by body scanning and centering on daily activities. In these techniques, you can focus you on your thoughts, feelings and thus explore the feelings and emotions that you are not always aware. These exercises are short and can be practiced in many situations of everyday life. Only requirements to be effective, they must be repeated regularly. Mindfulness meditation is a technique completely adapted to modern relaxation and is very effective in many problems like stress, anxiety and depression, in which the thoughts and emotions play a crucial role. Earnings The regular practice of our application Releasing negative thoughts will bring you the following benefits: - Become more aware of bodily sensations, feelings and thoughts, time after time. - Take a step back from the world and everyday annoyances. - Read back to the present when your mind wanders naturally. - Change your relationship to negative thoughts, so that you do more but were dependent you are in relationship with them, as the object of your attention. Customizable learning Accessible and customizable, our application Releasing negative thoughts allows you to arrange your own program mindfulness listening and following the recommendations of Dr. Dominique Servant, through videos to understand the mindfulness meditation, practical advice to act in daily life, photo slideshows and musical accompaniments. Our various self-assessment tests facilitate your learning and progressive track your progress. Far from being a waste of time, Releasing negative thoughts helps you to be more in tune with yourself everyday. Author & scientific collaboration Dr. Dominique Servant Psychiatrist and psychotherapist, Dr. Dominique Servant directs specialized Stress Anxiety at the University Hospital of Lille unit. Dr. Servant is one of the best French specialists stress and anxiety and it uses relaxation for 15 years at the University Hospital of Lille. He is the author of: - Relaxation: new approaches, new practices (Masson). - Relaxation and Meditation. Finding emotional balance (Odile Jacob). - Treating Stress and Anxiety by itself (Odile Jacob).

détaillée des 3 exercices - Docteur Dominique Servant / Docteur Christophe André 3 tests d’auto-évaluation avec résultats, interprétations et suivi - Savez-vous vous relaxer ? (10 questions) - Etes-vous d’un naturel anxieux ? (18 questions) - Etes-vous d’un naturel stressé ? (22 questions) Un apprentissage personnalisable 6 diaporamas photos en complément 6 thèmes musicaux en accompagnement En résumé Notre application de méditation de pleine conscience Méditer pour ne plus stresser va vous aider à habiter l’instant présent pour rompre le processus de pilotage automatique dans lequel vous vous retrouvez dans de nombreux moment de votre vie quotidienne. Habiter l’instant présent, c’est simplement accueillir tout ce qui se passe autour de vous et en vous, simplement en prêtant attention à la respiration, aux sensations corporelles, aux sons autour de vous, sans chercher à juger, à filtrer, à contrôler ou à agir. Ainsi, vous apprenez à prendre davantage de recul par rapport au fonctionnement habituel de vos pensées : être davantage dans l’instant présent que dans le jugement. En vous centrant sur l’instant présent, vous créez un espace de liaison avec vous-même, tout en prenant conscience de votre respiration, de votre corps, de vos pensées et de la nature du mental. Bien sûr, de nombreuses pensées vagabondes vont se manifester et vous devez apprendre, par la pratique et l’entraînement à revenir sur la pleine conscience de l’instant présent. Bénéfices La pratique régulière de notre application Méditer pour ne plus stresser va vous apporter les bénéfices suivants : - Aménager un espace personnel de détente et de liaison avec vous-même, en étant simplement attentif à votre respiration. - Devenir plus conscient des sensations/perceptions corporelles, des sentiments et des pensées, moment après moment. - Développer votre concentration. - Réagir différemment face aux situations générant du stress, prendre du recul par rapport au monde et aux stimuli quotidiens. - Savoir revenir sur le présent lorsque votre esprit naturellement vagabonde. - Prévenir l’installation de pensées négatives, modifier votre relation aux pensées, pour que vous n’en dépendiez plus mais que vous soyez en relation avec elles, comme objet de votre attention. - Prendre conscience des sons qui vous entourent et des sensations corporelles. Auteurs & collaboration scientifique Docteur Dominique Servant Médecin psychiatre et psychothérapeute, le docteur Dominique Servant dirige l’unité spécialisée Stress Anxiété au CHRU de Lille. Considéré comme l’un des meilleurs spécialistes français du stress et de l’anxiété, il utilise la relaxation depuis 15 ans au CHU de Lille. Il est l’auteur de : - Relaxation : nouvelles approches, nouvelles pratiques (Masson) - Relaxation et Méditation. Trouver son équilibre émotionnel (Odile Jacob). - Soigner le stress et l’anxiété par soi-même (Odile Jacob). Docteur Christophe André Médecin psychiatre et psychothérapeute, attaché à l’hôpital Saint Anne à Paris, le docteur Christophe André est l’auteur de nombreux ouvrages qui ont obtenu un très grand succès auprès du public : - Méditer, jour après jour (L’Iconoclaste) - Sérénité, 25 histoires d’équilibre intérieur (Odile Jacob) - Les états d’âme. Un apprentissage de la sérénité (Odile Jacob) 3 exercises self-help therapy: 28 minutes accompanying I focus on the present moment - 6mn41 I focus on my breathing - 10mn32 I focus on the external noise - 10mn28 Practical advice for daily action 4 videos to understand the technical - What is mindfulness meditation? - How to practice mindfulness meditation? - Benefits of mindfulness meditation - Focusing on the present moment 4 records to master board - Meditating for not stressing - Recommendations and benefits of the practice - Detailed description of the 3 years - Dr Dominique Servant / Doctor Christophe André 3 self-assessment tests results, interpretations and monitoring - Do you relax? (10 questions) - Are you a natural anxiety? (18 questions) - Are you a stressed natural? (22 questions) Customizable learning 6 photo slideshows in addition 6 musical themes accompanying In brief Our application of mindfulness meditation Meditation for stress will not help you live the moment to break the process autopilot in which you find in many moment of your daily life. Live the present moment, it's just welcome whatever is happening around you and within you, simply by paying attention to the breath, bodily sensations, sounds around you, without trying to judge, to filter, to control or act. So, you learn to take more back from the usual operation of your thoughts to be more in the moment than in the judgment. By focusing on you the moment you create a space connecting with yourself, while being aware of your breathing, your body, your thoughts and the nature of mind. Of course, many wandering thoughts will manifest themselves and you have to learn through practice and training to return to full awareness of the present moment. Earnings The regular practice of our Meditation application no longer stress will bring you the following benefits: - Develop a personal space of relaxation and connection with yourself, simply by being aware of your breathing. - Become more aware of the sensations / bodily perceptions, feelings and thoughts, time after time. - Develop your concentration. - React differently to situations that generate stress, take a step back from the world and everyday stimuli. - Read back to the present when your mind wanders naturally. - Prevent the installation of negative thoughts, change your relationship to thoughts, so that you do more but were dependent you are in relationship with them, as the object of your attention. - Become aware of the sounds around you and bodily sensations. Authors & scientific collaboration Dr. Dominique Servant Psychiatrist and psychotherapist, Dr. Dominique Servant directs specialized Stress Anxiety at the University Hospital of Lille unit. Considered one of the best French specialists stress and anxiety, it uses the relaxation for 15 years at the University Hospital of Lille. He is the author of: - Relaxation: new approaches, new practices (Masson) - Relaxation and Meditation. Finding emotional balance (Odile Jacob). - Treating Stress and Anxiety by itself (Odile Jacob). Dr. Christophe André Psychiatrist and psychotherapist, attached to the Saint Anne Hospital in Paris, Dr. Christophe André is the author of many books that have obtained a great success with the public: - Meditate every day (The Iconoclast) - Serenity, 25 stories of inner balance (Odile Jacob) - The emotional. Learning serenity (Odile Jacob)

détaillée des 4 exercices - Docteur Dominique Servant 3 tests d’auto-évaluation avec résultats, interprétations et suivi : -Savez-vous vous relaxer ? (10 questions) -Etes-vous d’un naturel anxieux ? (18 questions) -Etes-vous d’un naturel stressé ? (22 questions) Un apprentissage personnalisable 6 diaporamas photos en complément 6 thèmes musicaux en accompagnement En résumé À partir de notre application de détente musculaire progressive Se libérer des tensions, vous pouvez induire un état de relaxation musculaire général de l’ensemble de votre corps. L’action directe sur le corps sera pour beaucoup d’entre-vous le moyen le plus simple d’obtenir un état de relaxation et de ressentir des effets de bien-être mental, plus difficiles à obtenir simplement par la pensée. Le principe repose sur l'existence d'une relation entre l'état de relaxation et la tension musculaire. Plus vous êtes tendu, moins vous êtes relaxé. En pratique, vous allez contracter puis détendre successivement différents groupes musculaires. En obtenant ainsi un état de décontraction musculaire, vous agissez indirectement, dans un second temps, sur la tension psychique et émotionnelle pour aboutir à un état de relaxation générale. La relaxation musculaire est l’une des techniques les plus accessibles et des plus efficaces. Vous pouvez obtenir cette détente musculaire de deux façons : - la première par action directe en contractant et en décontractant les muscles. - la seconde en induisant la sensation de détente et de calme par autosuggestion. Bénéfices La pratique régulière de notre application Se libérer des tensions va vous apporter les bénéfices suivants : - Obtenir par la contraction-décontraction un état de détente musculaire de l’ensemble du corps. - Réduire les tensions spécifiques du corps : contractures musculaires au niveau de la nuque, des épaules, du dos… - Se détendre en un temps de plus en plus court et savoir retrouver un état de détente par la suggestion. - Trouver le sommeil en position allongée. - Utiliser la relaxation musculaire dans la vie de tous les jours pour agir sur la tension psychique et émotionnelle et pour aboutir à un état de relaxation générale. Apprentissage personnalisable Accessible à tous et personnalisable, notre application Se libérer des tensions permet d’aménager votre propre programme de relaxation musculaire en écoutant et en suivant les recommandations du docteur Dominique Servant, au travers de vidéos pour comprendre la détente musculaire progressive, de conseils pratiques pour agir au quotidien, de diaporamas photos et d’accompagnements musicaux. Nos différents tests d’auto-évaluation facilitent votre apprentissage progressif et le suivi de vos progrès. Loin d’être une perte de temps, Se libérer des tensions vous aide à être plus en phase avec vous-même au quotidien. Auteur & collaboration scientifique Docteur Dominique Servant Médecin psychiatre et psychothérapeute, le docteur Dominique Servant dirige l’unité spécialisée Stress Anxiété au CHRU de Lille. Le docteur Servant est l’un des meilleurs spécialistes français du stress et de l’anxiété et il utilise la relaxation depuis 15 ans au CHU de Lille. Il est l’auteur de : - Relaxation : nouvelles approches, nouvelles pratiques (Masson) - Relaxation et Méditation. Trouver son équilibre émotionnel (Odile Jacob). - Soigner le stress et l’anxiété par soi-même (Odile Jacob). 4 exercises self-help therapy: 32 minutes accompanying I relaxed my upper body - 7mn05 I relaxed my whole body - 7mn41 I relaxed my body quickly - 7mn01 I gradually relaxed my body - 10mn14 3 videos to understand the technique: - What is progressive muscle relaxation? - How to practice progressive muscle relaxation? - Benefits of progressive muscle relaxation 4 records council to master: - To release tension - Recommendations and benefits of the practice - Detailed description of the 4 years - Dr Dominique Servant 3 tests for self-assessment findings, interpretations and monitoring: -Do you relax? (10 questions) -Are you a natural anxiety? (18 questions) -Are you a stressed natural? (22 questions) Customizable learning 6 photo slideshows in addition 6 musical themes accompanying In brief From our application of progressive muscle relaxation Releasing tension, you can induce a state of general muscular relaxation throughout your body. Direct action on the body will be for many of you the easiest way to get a state of relaxation means and feel the effects of mental well-being, more difficult to get just by thinking. The principle is based on the existence of a relationship between the state of relaxation and muscle tension. More tense you are, the less you are relaxed. In practice, you will contract and relax different muscle groups in succession. Thereby achieving a state of muscle relaxation, you act indirectly, in a second time on the mental and emotional strain to reach a state of general relaxation. Muscle relaxation is one of the most accessible and most effective techniques. You can get this muscle relaxation in two ways: - The first by direct action by contracting and relaxing the muscles. - The second by inducing the sensation of relaxation and calm by autosuggestion. Earnings The regular practice of our application Releasing tension will bring you the following benefits: - Get the contraction-relaxation in a state of muscle relaxation of the entire body. - Reduce the specific tensions of the body: muscle spasms in the neck, shoulders, back ... - Relax in a time shorter and shorter and know find a state of relaxation by the suggestion. - Find sleep lying down. - Use muscle relaxation in the life of every day to work on the mental and emotional stress and lead to a state of general relaxation. Customizable learning Accessible and customizable, our application Releasing tension allows you to arrange your own program of muscle relaxation by listening and following the recommendations of Dr. Dominique Servant, through videos include progressive muscle relaxation, practical tips for action daily, photo slideshows and musical accompaniments. Our various self-assessment tests facilitate your learning and progressive track your progress. Far from being a waste of time, Releasing tension helps you to be more in tune with yourself everyday. Author & scientific collaboration Dr. Dominique Servant Psychiatrist and psychotherapist, Dr. Dominique Servant directs specialized Stress Anxiety at the University Hospital of Lille unit. Dr. Servant is one of the best French specialists stress and anxiety and it uses relaxation for 15 years at the University Hospital of Lille. He is the author of: - Relaxation: new approaches, new practices (Masson) - Relaxation and Meditation. Finding emotional balance (Odile Jacob). - Treating Stress and Anxiety by itself (Odile Jacob).

(20 questions) Un apprentissage personnalisable 6 diaporamas photos en complément 6 thèmes musicaux en accompagnement En résumé Notre application Libérer le stress va vous aider à mieux gérer le stress et à lui mettre des limites. Car, que ce soit dans la vie personnelle ou professionnelle, le stress ne prévient pas vraiment quand ses effets causent des dommages sur la santé de ceux dont le niveau d’anxiété est trop élevé. Il est donc bénéfique et important pour vous d’apprendre à libérer et évacuer votre stress d'une manière saine - sans vous tourner vers des moyens inefficaces et nocifs - afin de maintenir votre bonne santé globale. La solution passe avant tout par vous-même, par votre désir de changer les choses, d’être le moteur de ce changement. Ces exercices vont vous accompagner dans cette démarche en vous apprenant à mobiliser vos propres ressources. Après avoir retrouvé votre capacité à vous détendre, vous prenez le temps de vous dégager des stress excessifs. Vous choisissez des moments de recentrage pour vivre des temps de calme plus profonds et renforcer ainsi votre capacité d’équilibre et d’harmonie personnelle. Objectifs Notre application Libérer le stress a plusieurs objectifs : - Se recentrer sur le présent et savoir prendre du temps pour soi - Découvrir ses sensations corporelles – révélées par chaque pratique -, les accueillir et se relier à ses propres impressions. - Faire confiance à la sagesse de son corps pour élargir le champ de conscience de sa réalité et son équilibre Corps-Esprit. - Apprendre à chaque pratique à recueillir et mobiliser les sensations positives de l’expérience en atteignant le niveau sophro-liminal (défini en sophrologie comme un état entre veille et sommeil). Apprentissage personnalisable Accessible à tous et personnalisable, notre application Libérer le stress permet d’aménager votre propre programme de sophrologie en écoutant et en suivant les recommandations des Docteurs Dominique Servant et Marc Hay, au travers de vidéos pour comprendre la sophrologie, de conseils pratiques pour agir au quotidien, de diaporamas photos et d’accompagnements musicaux. Nos différents tests d’auto-évaluation facilitent votre apprentissage progressif et le suivi de vos progrès. Loin d’être une perte de temps, Libérer le stress vous aide à être plus en phase avec vous-même au quotidien. détaillée des 3 exercices - Docteur Dominique Servant / Docteur Christophe André 3 tests d’auto-évaluation avec résultats, interprétations et suivi - Savez-vous vous relaxer ? (10 questions) - Etes-vous d’un naturel anxieux ? (18 questions) - Etes-vous d’un naturel stressé ? (22 questions) Un apprentissage personnalisable 6 diaporamas photos en complément 6 thèmes musicaux en accompagnement En résumé Votre corps est un formidable poste d’observation de ce qui se passe en vous, au niveau psychologique et mental, car vos émotions et vos pensées l’habitent et le modifient en permanence. Beaucoup de problèmes, de souffrances, de pathologies sont liées à une mauvaise écoute, une mauvaise compréhension de votre corps. Hors, l’attention au corps est nécessaire ; c’est un besoin fondamental. Notre application Etre à l’écoute de son corps va affiner votre capacité à percevoir ce qui se passe en vous au niveau corporel et développer une meilleure intelligence de votre corps. Pour ce faire, vous allez pratiquer le Body Scan (ou balayage corporel) qui consiste à fixer votre attention sur les différentes parties de votre corps, les unes après les autres, guidé par la conscience. Ainsi, la méditation de pleine conscience va passer davantage par votre corps - qui va devenir un allié pour mieux habiter l’instant présent - que par votre mental. Vous allez alors développer la conscience de vos sensations physiques, amener une conscience détaillée vers chaque endroit de votre corps et améliorer la concentration et le calme. Bénéfices La pratique régulière de notre application Etre à l’écoute de son corps va vous apporter les bénéfices suivants : - Aménager un espace personnel de détente et de liaison avec vous-même, en étant attentif à votre respiration. - Devenir plus conscient de vos sensations/perceptions corporelles, de vos sentiments et de vos pensées, moment après moment. - Développer votre concentration. - Réagir différemment face aux situations générant du stress, prendre du recul par rapport au monde et aux stimuli quotidiens. - Savoir revenir sur le présent lorsque votre esprit naturellement vagabonde. - Modifier votre relation aux pensées négatives, pour que vous n’en dépendiez plus mais que vous soyez en relation avec elles, comme objet de votre attention. - Introduire le lien entre une pensée et une réponse émotionnelle / corporelle. Auteurs & collaboration scientifique Docteur Dominique Servant Médecin psychiatre et psychothérapeute, le docteur Dominique Servant dirige l’unité spécialisée Stress Anxiété au CHRU de Lille. Considéré comme l’un des meilleurs spécialistes français du stress et de l’anxiété, il utilise la relaxation depuis 15 ans au CHU de Lille. Il est l’auteur de : - Relaxation : nouvelles approches, nouvelles pratiques (Masson) - Relaxation et Méditation. Trouver son équilibre émotionnel (Odile Jacob). - Soigner le stress et l’anxiété par soi-même (Odile Jacob). Docteur Christophe André Médecin psychiatre et psychothérapeute, attaché à l’hôpital Saint Anne à Paris, le docteur Christophe André est l’auteur de nombreux ouvrages qui ont obtenu un très grand succès auprès du public : - Méditer, jour après jour (L’Iconoclaste) - Sérénité, 25 histoires d’équilibre intérieur (Odile Jacob) - Les états d’âme. Un apprentissage de la sérénité (Odile Jacob) 3 exercises self-help therapy: 35 minutes accompanying I practice standing Body Scan - 10mn55 I practice elongated Body Scan - 12mn32 I practice sitting Body Scan - 11mn27 4 videos to understand the technical - What is mindfulness meditation? - How to practice mindfulness meditation? - Benefits of mindfulness meditation - Listening to her body 4 records to master board - Listening to her body - Recommendations and benefits of the practice - Detailed description of the 3 years - Dr Dominique Servant / Doctor Christophe André 3 self-assessment tests results, interpretations and monitoring - Do you relax? (10 questions) - Are you a natural anxiety? (18 questions) - Are you a stressed natural? (22 questions) Customizable learning 6 photo slideshows in addition 6 musical themes accompanying In brief Your body is a wonderful observation of what is happening inside you post, psychologically and mentally, because your emotions and thoughts live and constantly changing. Many problems, suffering, diseases related to poor listening, poor understanding of your body. Out, attention to body is necessary, it is a basic need. Being our application to listen to your body will refine your ability to perceive what is going on in you body level and develop a better understanding of your body. To do this, you will practice the Body Scan (or body scan) of fixing your attention on different parts of your body, one after the other, guided by conscience. Thus, mindfulness meditation is more through your body - will become a better place to live in the present moment - as your mind. You will then develop awareness of your physical sensations, bring a detailed awareness to each part of your body and improve concentration and calm. Earnings The regular practice of our Being application to listen to your body will bring you the following benefits: - Develop a personal relaxation and connecting with yourself, paying attention to your breathing. - Become more aware of your feelings / bodily perceptions, your feelings and your thoughts, time after time. - Develop your concentration. - React differently to situations that generate stress, take a step back from the world and everyday stimuli. - Read back to the present when your mind wanders naturally. - Change your relationship to negative thoughts, so that you do more but were dependent you are in relationship with them, as the object of your attention. - Insert the link between thinking and emotional / physical response. Authors & scientific collaboration Dr. Dominique Servant Psychiatrist and psychotherapist, Dr. Dominique Servant directs specialized Stress Anxiety at the University Hospital of Lille unit. Considered one of the best French specialists stress and anxiety, it uses the relaxation for 15 years at the University Hospital of Lille. He is the author of: - Relaxation: new approaches, new practices (Masson) - Relaxation and Meditation. Finding emotional balance (Odile Jacob). - Treating Stress and Anxiety by itself (Odile Jacob). Dr. Christophe André Psychiatrist and psychotherapist, attached to the Saint Anne Hospital in Paris, Dr. Christophe André is the author of many books that have obtained a great success with the public: - Meditate every day (The Iconoclast) - Serenity, 25 stories of inner balance (Odile Jacob) - The emotional. Cela ne signifie pas « rien faire » mais plutôt prendre le temps de cesser toute activité formelle extérieure sans autre but que d’être pleinement présent à chaque instant, dans la conscience et l’intention. Vous vous détachez de pensées ou ruminations intérieures, de vos points de vue, de vos désirs, pour aller vers quelque chose de plus fort et de plus sain, issue de cette invitation à les observer sans action, sans modification, sans jugement. Vous vous autorisez à ne plus avoir le contrôle conscient de vous-même et de tout ce qui nous entoure. Et au contraire, vous laissez votre inconscient la place de s'exprimer librement, vous permettez à vos émotions de vous envahir librement, vous laissez libre court aux pensées spontanées. En pratiquant les exercices de ce module, vous suivez des chemins vers la relaxation et la conscience, vous vous rendez disponible pour mobiliser votre vitalité et optimiser vos capacités de repos. Grâce à la pratique, vous réapprenez à écouter votre corps, vous renforcez l’unité de votre esprit et de votre corps Objectifs Notre application Apprendre à lâcher-prise a plusieurs objectifs : - Se recentrer sur le présent et savoir prendre du temps pour soi - Découvrir ses sensations corporelles – révélées par chaque pratique -, les accueillir et se relier à ses propres impressions. - Faire confiance à la sagesse de son corps pour élargir le champ de conscience de sa réalité et son équilibre Corps-Esprit. - Apprendre à chaque pratique à recueillir et mobiliser les sensations positives de l’expérience en atteignant le niveau sophro-liminal (défini en sophrologie comme un état entre veille et sommeil). Vous apprenez à générer des sentiments de joie, de contentement, de reconnaissance, de gratitude, qui vont vous permettre de trouver un espace de sérénité intérieure et de mieux résister aux environnements perturbateurs de la vie quotidienne. Vous explorez différentes nuances d'émotions positives - appréciation, amour, enthousiasme, optimisme, respect - qui vont vous aider à mieux vivre en harmonie avec vous-même et, parfois, à faire la différence entre échec et réussite. Vous êtes invité à faire un "pas de coté", à porter un nouveau regard comme si c’était la première fois puis à vous inscrire dans une attitude positive pour chacune de vos journées. Dans cet état d’esprit positif, vous serez plus enclins à la curiosité, l’exploration, l’apprentissage, la créativité. Pour acquérir ce “savoir-faire”, en dehors de toute réalité extérieure, vous allez entraîner votre esprit à fonctionner de manière positive, à remplacer l’obsession par le contentement, l’agitation par le calme, la haine par la compassion. By fencer, for fencers. Application for fencing referees to keep track of time, scores, red/yellow cards and various game modes. Simple, minimalistic interface with seamless, intuitive user interaction. All elements can be clicked or long-pressed for multiple actions. (i.e. click to increment, long-press to decrement score and card count.) Note: Vibrates when timer is paused or resumed. Open Source: Code is accessible through GitHub.

Kids Safe Browser Parental Control app is a cloud based web content filtering browser to provide your kids a safer internet surfing environment. Its parental controls and web site filter can be remotely configured for young kids; teens and adults to block porn, adult and any other potential dangerous web sites. Allows for creation of custom whitelist; blacklist for websites/domains along with short cuts to white listed sites on home page for ease of use. Its also a plugin to the Kids Place - Parental Control app and adds web content filtering feature to it. Features: === 1. Blocks Porn, Adult, Social Media, Social Networking, Gaming, Pornography and over 50 other categories of websites 2. Create your own white list and black list of websites. 3. Set your own web filtering rules. 4. Configure web browser UI to allow address bar; searching; access to favorites etc. 5. Access to settings protected by Kids Place PIN. 6. Free 30 days trial account for personalized web content filtering on account creation. Please install License app on account expiration to continue using your personalized filter settings from here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kiddoware.kidsafebrowser.license On license expiration, app will still work but will apply default web content filtering (pre-configured) instead of your personal settings. Important Note: If you bought the license and you account is not upgraded immediately, please contact us asap at support@kiddoware.com and we will take care of it immediately. Help/FAQ for the app: http://browser.kiddoware.com/help Please contact us at support@kiddoware.com to report any issues; comments; feedback; bulk licensing and discounts for educational institutes.
release_text: Minor bug fixes regarding web content filtering and android parental controls for safe browser.

Kids Safe Video player with child lock for watching videos on YouTube or Device. Video player specifically designed for kids and toddlers. Parents can select a list of videos, stored on their device, YouTube or Internet that kids can watch. Kids will only be able to see the list of videos approved by parents. App also allows to search video from YouTube using safety mode so inappropriate videos are not returned in search results. App has been designed to be plugin for Kids Place but can run as a standalone app. TO USE IT WITH KIDS PLACE: +Just add the app to Kids Place and launch it from there to make sure all the parental control and child lock settings are enforced when Kids Video Player is being used. FEATURES: + Built-in player plays only the video formats supported by device. Please install MX Player to play videos no supported by stock player on device. + Setting to lock media controller on video player for toddlers and younger kids. + Scans your device and external storage for available videos for parents to select from. + Safe Search YouTube Videos + Import your YouTube Playlist + Add video URL from internet + Lot of options to control behavior on playback completion. + Enhanced child lock features based on Kids Place settings. + Auto Sync YouTube Playlist Free version only allows to save and play 10 videos. Please upgrade (via in-app purchase) to licensed version to save and play unlimited videos.

Shoe sizes are not measured in the same units around the world. You can use this application to convert from the shoe size used in one country or region to the shoe size used in another country or region. Because of the many discrepancies between sizing systems and the differences between manufacturers, it is never a good idea to buy shoes based solely on these conversions. The best practice I can recommend, if the company allows this, is to place orders in terms of inches, millimeters, or centimeters. The Mondopoint system is the same as measuring the foot (not the shoe) in Millimeters.

description: Kamus Besar Bahasa Indonesia (KBBI) Pusat Bahasa adalah kamus ekabahasa resmi bahasa Indonesia yang disusun oleh Tim Penyusun Kamus Pusat Bahasa dan diterbitkan oleh Balai Pustaka. Kamus ini menjadi acuan tertinggi bahasa Indonesia yang baku, karena kamus ini merupakan kamus bahasa Indonesia terlengkap dan yang paling akurat yang pernah diterbitkan oleh penerbit yang memiliki hak paten dari pemerintah Republik Indonesia. Kamus laring (offline) ini tidak memerlukan koneksi internet untuk pencarian, indeks pencarian diurutkan berdasarkan kata dasar, penjelasan dan turunan dari kata dasar tidak menjadi bagian indeks pencarian agar pencarian dapat lebih cepat dilakukan. Data disarikan dari Kamus Besar Bahasa Indonesia. Sumber data: http://pusatbahasa.kemdiknas.go.id/kbbi Big Indonesian Dictionary (KBBI) Language Center is the official Indonesian monolingual dictionary compiled by the Center for Language Dictionary Drafting Team and published by Balai Pustaka. This dictionary Indonesian became the highest reference standard, because this dictionary is a complete dictionary and Indonesian are the most accurate ever published by a publisher who has the patent rights from the Indonesian government. Dictionary larynx (offline) it does not require an internet connection to search, index search sorted by word basis, and the explanation derived from the word does not become part of the search index so that the search can be expedited. Data abstracted from the Dictionary of Indonesian. Data source: http://pusatbahasa.kemdiknas.go.id/kbbi

Daily Devotional App for Android. Daily Devotional Application is a collaboration of Yayasan Cahaya Bagi Negeri (CBN) or commonly referred to as Jawaban.com with Konsep Mobile. This Application uses excerpts from the official CBN. CBN is a foundation that exist to proclaim the love and goodness of God through the medium of creative and contextual manner. In Indonesia, the CBN has a TV program into the main show and the best known is the "Solusi". Not only has the TV program, but in order to improve services to the community for all the world, then built a mobile application that is "Daily Devotional - CBN". Feature : - Daily Devotional - Daily Quotes - Reading the Bible year - Choose quotes by date - Notification For more information : Yayasan Cahaya Bagi Negeri (CBN) : www.jawaban.com Konsep Mobile : www.konsepmobile.com Powered by KonsepMobile

release_text: 1.3.4 - FIXED ALL PREVIOUS BUGS. Sorry for that ^_^ - Added ability to chose between 2 clock styles, Square or Circle. - Added a colour picker to apply whatever colour on the clock and date. - Added only one permission.
