description: Официальное приложение, поддерживается лично Дмитрием Петровым. Внимание: все другие приложения с названием "Полиглот" не имеют отношения к системе Дмитрия Петрова. Для гарантии результата, устанавливайте только официальное приложение. Пользователи о приложении: "Замечательное приложение!!! Я в восторге от программы, действительно помогает довести до автоматизма базовую структуру времен глаголов!" ================ "Полиглот 16" - lite версия приложения для отработки английского языка. Эффективная методика с грамматическими пояснениями дают 100% РЕЗУЛЬТАТ. Полиглот 16 - будет очень полезен всем кто смотрел популярное реалити-шоу "Полиглот. Выучим английский за 16 часов!" ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ ПРИЛОЖЕНИЯ: ► Статистика ответов ► Вспомогательная таблица ► Наглядная визуальная подсказка ► Встроенное описание грамматики к каждой тренировке, к каждому предложению ТЕМЫ ГРАММАТИКИ ► Личные, притяжательные, возвратные, неопределенные местоимения. ► Основаная схема глагола. ► Времена: simple, continuous, perfect. ► Глаголы: все формы. ► Глагол to be. ► Страдательный залог. ► Предлоги ► Прилагательные: степени сравнения ► Параметры времени ► Побудительные и повелительные предложения ► Условные предложения, союз "чтобы" ► Модальные глаголы: can, should ► Порядковые числительные РАЗГОВОРНЫЕ ТЕМЫ ► О себе, чем я занимаюсь ► Этикет: приветствия, прощания ► Чувственные состояния ► О погоде ► и многие другие РЕЖИМЫ "Запоминание слов и фраз" "Составление предложений" "Cвободная тренировка" НЕКОТОРЫЕ СОВЕТЫ: ► Тренировки проходятся последовательно. ► Для подсказки пользуйтесь "быстрой справкой" - слева внизу значок вопроса. ► Чтобы отменить выбранное слово - коснитесь предложения. ► Чтобы сменить предложение - смахните на строке предложения справа налево. ОБРАТНАЯ СВЯЗЬ Любые пожелания присылайте на почту: poliglot_tv@enapp.ru Если встретили ошибку - присылайте также на почту: poliglot_tv@enapp.ru , будем благодарны. Понравилось приложение? - Оставьте отзыв! Official application, supported personally by Dmitry Petrov. Note: All other applications called "Polyglot" irrelevant to the system Dmitry Petrov. To guarantee results, install only official app. App users: "Great app! I am delighted with the program really helps to bring to the basic structure of automatism tense! " ================ "Polyglot 16" - lite version of the app for practicing English. Effective technique with grammatical explanations give 100% results. Polyglot 16 - will be very useful for everyone who watched the popular reality show "Polyglot. Learned English for 16 hours!" Possible applications: ► Statistics answers ► Reference Table ► A clear visual cue ► Built-in grammar description for each workout, each proposal GRAMMAR TOPICS ► Personal, possessive, reflexive, indefinite pronouns. ► based on the scheme of the verb. ► Times: simple, continuous, perfect. ► verbs: all forms. ► The verb to be. ► The passive voice. ► Prepositions ► Adjectives: degrees of comparison ► Time Options ► Incentive imperative and offers ► Conditional Sentences, union "to" ► Modal verbs: can, should ► Ordinal numbers CONVERSATION TOPICS ► About what I do ► Etiquette: greetings, goodbyes ► Sensual state ► About the weather ► and many others MODES "Memorizing words and phrases" "Preparation of proposals" "Free Standing training" SOME TIPS: ► training takes place sequentially. ► To use the tips "quick reference" - the question mark at the bottom left. ► To cancel the selected word - Touch offers. ► To change the offer - whisk on line offers right to left. FEEDBACK Any wishes send on e-mail: poliglot_tv@enapp.ru If you see errors - also send mail to: poliglot_tv@enapp.ru , we are grateful. Liked application? - Leave a review!

description: An anthill is everything for its inhabitants. They will fight for it till their last breath. Anthill Defender is an addictive and colorful Tower Defense game with great animations and challenging difficulty. Ants: Worker and Light Soldier - simple but very dedicated protectors Heavy Soldier - two-handed warrior Spitter - spits on three enemies simultaneously Ranger - flying and attacking enemies continuously Wizard - uses Ice, Fire and Poison damage depending on an enemy's resistance Queen - attacks every enemy simultaneously The game starts with two defenders and unlocks others after finishing the level. Each defender can be enhanced twice . You can sell a defender at any time and buy another one. At the end of each level you will have to defeat a powerful boss to unlock next level. It's a difficult game but we can assure you that each level can be finished without loosing a single egg! Anthill Defender is a must have game for Tower Defense fans! Tower Defense game from a tiny game studio made with passion, giving you the best Tower Defense experience.
release_text: Now all levels available in the free version!

description: Saev Mah Battery! Get your brightness even lower and without root ! Saev Mah Battery let you lower the brightness of your phone and disable your wallpaper to save your battery in one click. Works great on AMOLED screens ! The donate version also have a widget to turn SMB on and off faster.

app_name: ЕГЭ, ГИА и тесты для умных
description: У нас самая большая база реальных и при этом бесплатных тестов с Всероссийской олимпиады школьников, пока по биологии, но скоро появятся другие. Основная цель нашего приложения - предоставить как можно больше вариантов ЕГЭ по математике, ЕГЭ по русскому, а также других экзаменационных материалов абсолютно бесплатно. Мы ничего не продаем. Только ратуем за развитие науки. Не огорчайтесь что у нас пока мало тестов в ЕГЭ по биологии, зато есть все тесты Всероссийской олимпиады по биологии. ЕГЭ по химии и физике, тоже пока недостаточно наполнены, но мы над этим работаем. Приносим извинения, что в разделе ГИА пока ничего нет, мы написали приложение быстрее, чем сумели оцифровать тесты :-) Постараемся вскоре этот раздел доделать. We have the largest database of real and at the same time free tests with All-Russian Olympiad as in biology, but soon there will be others. The main objective of our application - to provide as much options USE math, USE in Russian, as well as other examination materials are absolutely free. We do not sell anything. Just stand up for the development of science. Do not worry that we do a little test in the exam in biology, but there are all tests of All-Russian Olympiad in biology. CSE in chemistry and physics, also not sufficiently filled, but we're working on it. We apologize that the section of the GIA until there is nothing, we wrote an application faster than managed to digitize the tests:-) We will try to complete this section soon.

Adaptxt Keyboard is the industry leading predictive text application for smartphones, tablets and other mobile devices. Adaptxt comes loaded with amazing features and languages, what's more, it's FREE! ## Wired Magazine recommends Adaptxt as the “BEST for: The jet-setting professional. Adaptxt is designed to predict words based on your specific writing style, as well as your location and interests. This keyboard is not only context-aware, it also adapts to the app you’re using.” ## USA Today said: “This is a cool keyboard for anyone who needs to access multiple languages.” #### SUPPORT ACROSS DEVICES The same app can be installed in smartphones, tablets and phablets, so you can enjoy the Adaptxt languages and features in all your devices. If you’re new to Adaptxt, here are the features that made us famous: LOCATION-BASED SUGGESTIONS: Adaptxt makes word suggestions, corrections and predictions more relevant to your location, to help you type seamlessly wherever you go. QUICK AND FUN INPUT Adaptxt enables you to insert entire phrases, as well as individual words, making text input even faster; with a support for over 600 emojis, you don’t need to use just words in your chat messages. PERSONALIZED TYPING EXPERIENCE Enrich your text with more personalized word prediction based on the application in use, writing style and trending words, which adds relevant context to your conversations. LARGEST LANGUAGE SUPPORT Enjoy the freedom of communicating in your native language. With support for 121 languages, we offer the best and largest language coverage in the virtual keyboard space. 49 industry-specific dictionaries make Adaptxt Keyboard a preferred choice for professionals such as doctors, lawyers, business people and others across domains. SEAMLESS TYPING Accurate autocorrection will make your writing flawless; you can tap or swipe over characters (GLIDE) to type quickly and accurately; Automatic Text Replacement (ATR) and application shortcuts will help you type effortlessly. EXTENSIVE KEYBOARD CUSTOMIZATION Choice of keyboard layouts, including 12-key (phone keypad); you can create your own themes, swap keys, and modify key shapes, font styles, background pictures and much more. #### FAQ: http://www.adaptxt.com/faq For issues/feature requests, email us at support@adaptxt.com Supports: Android 3.0 & above; touch screen & hard keyboard phones. If you are an Android or iOS app developer and want to leverage the Adaptxt prediction engine, please see http://www.adaptxt.com/developers/ We take your privacy very seriously. Adaptxt does not learn your password and never collects or sends your private data to 3rd parties. ******************************** SUPPORTED LANGUAGES: Afrikaans Albanian Arabic Armenian Assamese Azerbaijani Banglish Basque Belarusian Bengali Bhojpuri Bodo Bosnian (Cyrillic) Bosnian (Latin) Bulgarian Catalan Croatian Czech Danish Dogri Dutch English (Australia) English (India) English (UK) English (US) Estonian Filipino Finnish French (Belgium) French (Canada) French (France) French (Switzerland) Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Hausa Hawaiian Hebrew Hindi Hinglish Hungarian Icelandic Igbo Indonesian Irish Italian Javanese Kanglish Kannada Kashmiri Kazakh Konkani Korean Kurdish (Sorani) Latvian Lithuanian Macedonian Maithili Malay Malayalam Manglish Manipuri Manx Maori Marathi Marathinglish Marwari Mauritian Creole Mewari Nepali Neplish Norwegian Odinglish Oriya Pashto Persian Polish Portuguese (Brazil) Portuguese (Portugal) Punglish Punjabi Rajasthani Romanian Russian Sanskrit Scottish Gaelic Serbian (Cyrillic) Serbian (Latin) Sesotho (Lesotho) Sesotho (South Africa) Sindhi Singlish (Sri Lanka) Sinhala Slovak Slovenian SMS (Brazil) SMS (English) Spanish (Latin America) Spanish (Spain) Spanish (US) Sundanese Swahili Swedish Tajik Tamil Tanglish Telugu Tenglish Thai Turkish Turkmen Ukrainian Urdu Uzbek Vietnamese Welsh Xhosa Yoruba Zulu
release_text: • Added compatibility for tablets and phablets • Capacity of My Dictionary increased to 5000 words • Improved corrections for cases of error by key proximity • Improved elision correction • More accuracy in the autocorrection of contracted forms • Improved use of punctuations and quotations by language rules • Optimized dictionary sizes (files are 25% smaller) • Initial keyboard loading time reduced • Fixed issues of high memory usage

description: As legal professionals or law students, you constantly have to manually enter specialized words on your smartphones; your wasted productivity can be significantly reduced when you use the Adaptxt Legal keyboard. With a legal dictionary that includes more than 20,000 terms across 5 languages; legal professionals can save hours of productivity. As you start typing, frequently used legal terms from practices like tax law, federal law, state law and others are offered as suggestions to enhance your typing and note-taking experience. Adaptxt legal keyboard allows you to create shortcuts for frequently used text, saving you the hassle of repetitive typing. Adaptxt legal keyboard is the first custom-made keyboard for law school students and legal professionals including lawyers, paralegals, judges, and others working in law firms to offer an efficient texting experience. Key features: DICTIONARIES • 6 Legal dictionaries: Legal (FR), Legal (DE), Legal (ES), Legal (FI), Legal (UK) & Legal (US) • 81 languages • 39 valuable industry-specific dictionaries across domains: business, medicine, law, finance and IT & Telecom SMART PREDICTION & LEARNING • Error correction and context-based predictions • Learns from your writing style & provides personalized word suggestions • Learns from Facebook and Twitter TAP & GLIDE • Tap on keys or swipe over characters to form words (Glide) KEYBOARD LAYOUTS • 12 key layout • Language-specific layouts (QWERTY, QWERTZ, AZERTY, etc.) SHORTCUTS • Automatic Text Replacement (ATR) to create custom text shortcuts • Launch applications and websites from the keyboard THEMES & KEYBOARD CUSTOMIZATION • Dedicated legal themes • Create your own themes, swap keys, and modify key shape, font style, background picture, colors and height of your keyboard SINGLE TAP FUNCTIONS • Clipboard: select, cut, copy, paste & navigation keys • Revert key: undo auto correction • Share key: post messages on social networks from the keyboard. # # # # • For issues/feature requests on Adaptxt Legal Keyboard http://www.adaptxt.com/forum or email us at support@keypoint-tech.com

Impress your friends! Text and chat with real-time and relevant emojis making your texting intuitive, attractive, quick and a lot more fun! Wink It is designed as an innovative chat keyboard for Android smartphones that recommends relevant emoticons and images as you type. Wink It keyboard allows you to add some fun to your daily conversations! This emoji keyboard helps you add several different emotions to popular social media and chat applications. The keyboard offers real-time access to thousands of standard, action, emotional, fun and unique emojis and emoticons that can be used in casual chatting. With Wink It, sending a message like “Let’s grab a slice of PIZZA” can now be expressed visually. As you start typing, Wink It predicts what word is coming next in a sentence by offering emojis and emoticons that can easily be selected from the app’s suggestion bar. It also offers multiple emoticon predictions associated with single words, for instance, typing “fruit” will suggest images of an apple, a banana, a pineapple, etc. The keyboard provides two suggestion bars. The top suggestion bar offers additional images related to the first suggestion displayed in the lower suggestion bar. The keyboard is also intelligent as it continuously learns users’ writing styles to suggest the most accurate image, thus making texting considerably faster and more interesting. ** This is a beta release of the Wink It Keyboard. The license will expire after 90 days. # # # # EXCLUSIVE FEATURES: • Predicts single/multiple emojis and emoticons based on text input • Suggests emoticons based on continuous gesture input (Glide) • Learns context from user while typing and offers relevant emoticon suggestions ADDITIONAL FEATURES: • Auto Correction and Next word prediction • Learn from social accounts, SMS and contacts • ATR to create shortcuts • Glide Beta: slide over letters to form words without releasing your finger and customize Glide trace color • Customize gesture shortcuts to launch applications, websites and to perform clipboard operations • Private Mode to prevent keyboard from learning words # # # # • For issues/feature requests email us at support_LEGACY@keypoint-tech.com • FAQs: http://adaptxt.com/winkit/ # # # # Privacy Policy We take your privacy very seriously. Wink It does not learn your password and never collects or sends your private data. This keyboard also provides a Private mode option which prevents it from learning what you type. If you like this app, rate it ✮✮✮✮✮ on Google Play or like it on Facebook or Google+!
Read your favorite manga in your mobile devices. -Easy to used. -Enable zoom in and out.

An easy to use app that allows you to keep track of your individual softball or baseball hitting stats. Enter multiple teams and keep track of game stats for individual leagues and/or tournaments per team. Recommendations for improvements and bug reporting are welcome. I will make improvements and fixes as my schedule allows. ***** Recent issues regarding registering/logining in are being investigated. If you're having issues regarding these items, please consider becoming a beta tester. A slightly new look and improved user interface are in the works. I can roll out new beta's faster for testing issues. If interested, visit https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/softball-stats-tracker .
release_text: Uploading as temp fix to hopefully resolve login and registering errors that have been occurring. This version is still in major development for upgrades that will save data to a centralized server and integrate into a new website under development. **Fixed bug so games can now be edited

description: Read Dutch newspaper articles on your Android phone. Stories from all the national, regional and the most significant international newspapers. You can also add your own news. 'Kranten' is an easy to use RSS Reader, optimised for Dutch news. Add RSS feeds, categories and mobile websites of choice. Read all the news fast and easy in one app. Fully customisable and adjustable to personal preferences.

Limitations The Free version has its commands limited to cd, ls, touch, echo, grep, cat, ping, pwd, date Multiple commands cannot be strung together with the free version except for cd [dir]; ls SSH Tasker is a plugin for Locale/Tasker that allows you automatically log into a server via SSH and execute remote commands. * Tasker or Local is require to operate this plugin, the plugin will show up under plugin section when adding an action to a task. * Keyfile and password authentication is supported with rsa and dsa keys. * Encrypted keyfiles are supported. * Commands allow for variable substitution. * Output can be piped to a local Tasker variable (only available during the task) and be acted upon as soon as the command is completed without a Tasker wait. * Multiple servers are supported, with unique authentication for each. NOTE: Currently only openSSH keyfile is supported. (This means that connectbot keys will not work without converting them first).
release_text: * Enabled copy and paste * Bug fixes * Renamed to ssh plugin lite to distinguish in tasker plugin selector

description: WearBright is a one click solution to maximize the brightness of your screen of your android device. The idea is when you are in direct sunlight you can say one command and click the screen to max the brightness of your watch. When you go back indoor you can launch the app again and revert the setting. Note once you change the brightness they will stick, so you can exit the app and the brightness will remain the same. You can launch WearBright by clicking the screen, scrolling down to start, and choose WearBright. Alternatively you can say "OK Google start Brightness" or "Go Go Gadget Brightness" (A far easier option if you can't see the screen in direct sunlight). The accompanying phone app currently doesn't do much other then give you one more option to max the screen brightness. In the not to distant future I will add tasker support to change brightness on the fly.
release_text: V 1.2 Fixed a bug that refused to launch app by voice. Also removed settings that wasn't being used. V 1.1 Fixed a bug that wouldn't push the mobile version of the apk to the watch. The added permission requirement is for the watch, Google requires the permissions to match watch and phone (but didn't document this very well).

description: Pop quiz: you flip a fair coin 50 times. What is the probability that it lands on heads at least 25 times? The number of computations involved in answering that question is staggering. The formulas can cause nightmares. "Probability Pro" will tell you that the answer is 55.61% instantly. How about this classic? In a room of 23 people, what is the probability that at least two people share the same birthday? Believe it or not, it's 50.73%. This powerful application will explain why, and it will calculate the probability for any number of people. How long would it take you to figure out the answers to those questions without "Probability Pro?" How much time do you want to spend checking your homework? This application features a rich set of tutorials, examples, and solvers for the following topics: - Formulas - Venn Diagrams - Survey Results - Bayes' Theorem - Odds - Permutations - Combinations - Taking Balls from Urns - Replacement vs. Non-Replacement - Independent Events - Dice - Roulette - Lottery - Poker - General Card Problems - Expected Value - Birthday Problem - Normal Distributions Most, but not all, topics have solvers. El Chancho VA es un juego de cartas español con un objetivo muy simple pero divertido. El objetivo es juntar 4 cartas del mismo numero en la mano y tocar el centro de la mesa lo mas rapido posible. Pasa juntar las cartas, se indicara en el centro la direccion y la cantidad de cartas a darle a otro jugador. Las direcciones posibles pueden ser hacia la izquierda, centro o derecha. La cantidad maxima de cartas a mover es de 3 cartas. Una vez que un jugador toque el centro de la mesa, todos los jugadores tambien deben tocarlo. El ultimo jugador en tocar el centro, es eliminado de la ronda. Cuando un jugador es eliminado, se devuelven las cartas y se empieza otra ronda pero con un jugador menos. El ultimo jugador restante es el ganador de la partida. El juego cuenta con tres niveles de dificultad yse puede jugar con hasta 6 oponentes en una misma partida. Se guardan las estadisticas de ganadas y perdidas. Pueden verse con la respectiva opcion en el menu principal. Cualquier problema o sugerencia con el juego pueden enviar un mail con el indicado en esta pagina. The Pig VA is a Spanish card game with a very simple but fun goal. The goal is to collect 4 cards of the same number in hand and touch the center of the table as fast as possible. Spend collect the cards are in the center indicate the direction and the number of cards to give to another player. Possible directions can be left, center or right. The maximum number of cards is 3 move cards. Once a player touches the center of the table, all players must also play it. The last player to touch the center, is eliminated from the round. When a player is eliminated, the cards are returned and another round starts but with one less player. The last player remaining is the winner of the game. The game features three difficulty levels yse can play with up to 6 opponents in the same game. The statistics of wins and losses are saved. They can be seen with the respective option in the main menu. Any problems or suggestions to the game can send a mail to that stated on this page.

app_name: Where did I park the car?
description: Always remember where you parked your car with this application simple and easy to use. Features: - Saves the car's position using GPS and map view. - Takes a picture that is saved along with the location. - It also allows you to add a text note, useful in underground car parks where there is no GPS signal. - Recovery of saved locations, indicating on a map where is the car and where the user is. - Saves up to 10 locations. - Sets the number of locations to store, automatically deleting the oldest. - Manually deleting locations. In the Pro version: - Allows you to mark your favorite applications to store all the time you want. - Normal map view or satellite - No ads! Instructions: 1- Take a location using the GPS signal. You can add a picture and a text note. You can save locations without GPS signal. 2- See a specific location: select from the list of saved locations. Automatic centering on the user's position or the car's position. 3- To delete a location, do a long click on the list of locations. You can also delete all. For proper operation it is recommended to activate the GPS and data connection to display the maps. It is also recommended to enable the use of wireless networks when GPS information is not available.

Whot! was one of the earliest commercial games based of the Eights family, in which players try to be the first to get rid of their cards by following number or suit. How to play: * any card with the same symbol (suit) as the previous play; * any card with the same number as the previous play; * any "Whot" card. When a Whot card is played, the player must name a suit (symbol). The next card played must be a card of the named suit or another Whot card. If you cannot or do not wish to play a card at your turn, you draw one card from the draw pile instead; having drawn a card, you are not allowed to play a card on this turn. winning: the first player to get rid of all their cards is the winner.

Hypnosis is a powerful modifier of human behavior and has been proven in numerous studies to effect rapid, profound and permanent change. Hypnosis can not only eliminate the feelings of lack and motivate you to attract more good things into your life, but can also go directly to the root of your inability to access the law of attraction. Tackling at its core the issues and circumstances that surround the law of attraction. Peeling away the layers until finally you can see clearly the way forward without looking back. Imagine not feeling there is a lack within the universe all the time. Imagine YOUR self feeling positive and in control. Imagine being proud of your ability to utilize the law of attraction in your life. To never ever again be subject to negative thoughts. Imagine achieving your dreams. Accomplishing your goals and succeeding in your vision. Finally! MINDSOFT™ SLEEP HYPNOSIS Our MindSoft™ Sleep Hypnosis recording are specifically designed to be listened to at bedtime, when the user can listen, as they fall asleep. Together with hypnotic speech patterns that remove negative thoughts, attitudes, habits and behaviours, listening whilst asleep, when our conscious mind is naturally subdued, allows our recordings to gain access and speak directly to the subconscious mind. Creating the perfect conditions for rapid and profound change! HYPNOTHERAPIST TO THE STARS Randy Charach, is a Canadian hypnotherapist with over 20 years experience in the field. Randy has hypnotized the likes of John Travolta, Tony Curtis, Sean Penn and many others from all walks of life. His satisfied clients also include many well-known corporations. He has performed for companies like Microsoft, AT&T, Coca-Cola, Disney, IBM and Xerox, and many, many other satisfied clients. LEARN TO LET GO You deserve to be happy, you deserve to be successful and you deserve to have the law of attraction work for you. These are things you have probably never said out loud to yourself, something that you may not truly believe. If you can change the way you think, then you can change the way you live. There is no effort on your part, you simply listen, relax and fall asleep. You will notice an amazing change in how you feel immediately and soon the changes in your life will be so dramatic that your family and friends will be amazed. They will want to know your secret and beg you to tell them what you are doing. You can simply say - it is not what I am doing, it is what I am thinking!

app_name: ประมวลกฎหมายแพ่งและพาณิชย์
description: ประมวลกฎหมายแพ่งและพาณิชย์ ซึ่งมีเนื้อหาบางส่วนดังต่อไปนี้ ข้อความเบื้องต้น มาตรา 1 กฎหมายนี้ให้เรียกว่า ประมวลกฎหมายแพ่งและพาณิชย์ มาตรา 2 ให้ใช้ประมวลกฎหมายนี้ตั้งแต่วันที่ 1 เดือนมกราคม พระพุทธศักราช 2468 เป็นต้นไป มาตรา 3 ตั้งแต่วันที่ใช้ประมวลกฎหมายนี้สืบไป ให้ยกเลิกบรรดากฎหมาย กฎ และข้อบังคับอื่น ๆ ในส่วนที่มีบัญญัติไว้แล้วในประมวลกฎหมายนี้หรือซึ่งแย้งกับบทแห่งประมวลกฎหมายนี้ บรรพ 1 หลักทั่วไป ลักษณะ 1 บทเบ็ดเสร็จทั่วไป มาตรา 4 กฎหมายนั้น ต้องใช้ในบรรดากรณีซึ่งต้องด้วยบทบัญญัติใด ๆ แห่งกฎหมายตามตัวอักษร หรือตามความมุ่งหมายของบทบัญญัตินั้น ๆ เมื่อไม่มีบทกฎหมายที่จะยกมาปรับคดีได้ ให้วินิจฉัยคดีนั้นตามจารีตประเพณีแห่งท้องถิ่น ถ้าไม่มีจารีตประเพณีเช่นว่านั้น ให้วินิจฉัยคดีอาศัยเทียบบทกฎหมายที่ใกล้เคียงอย่างยิ่ง และถ้าบทกฎหมายเช่นนั้นก็ไม่มีด้วย ให้วินิจฉัยตามหลักกฎหมายทั่วไป มาตรา 5 ในการใช้สิทธิแห่งตนก็ดี ในการชำระหนี้ก็ดี บุคคลทุกคนต้องกระทำโดยสุจริต มาตรา 6 ให้สันนิษฐานไว้ก่อนว่า บุคคลทุกคนกระทำการโดยสุจริต มาตรา 7 ถ้าจะต้องเสียดอกเบี้ยแก่กันและมิได้กำหนดอัตราดอกเบี้ยไว้โดยนิติกรรมหรือโดยบทกฎหมายอันชัดแจ้ง ให้ใช้อัตราร้อยละเจ็ดครึ่งต่อปี มาตรา 8 คำว่า "เหตุสุดวิสัย" หมายความว่า เหตุใด ๆ อันจะเกิดขึ้นก็ดี จะให้ผลพิบัติก็ดี เป็นเหตุที่ไม่อาจป้องกันได้แม้ทั้งบุคคลผู้ต้องประสบหรือใกล้จะต้องประสบเหตุนั้น จะได้จัดการระมัดระวังตามสมควรอันพึงคาดหมายได้จากบุคคลในฐานะและภาวะเช่นนั้น มาตรา 9 เมื่อมีกิจการอันใดซึ่งกฎหมายบังคับให้ทำเป็นหนังสือ บุคคลผู้จะต้องทำหนังสือไม่จำเป็นต้องเขียนเอง แต่หนังสือนั้นต้องลงลายมือชื่อของบุคคลนั้น ลายพิมพ์นิ้วมือ แกงได ตราประทับ หรือเครื่องหมายอื่นทำนองเช่นว่านั้นที่ทำลงในเอกสารแทนการลงลายมือชื่อ หากมีพยานลงลายมือชื่อรับรองไว้ด้วยสองคนแล้วให้ถือเสมอกับลงลายมือชื่อ ความในวรรคสองไม่ใช้บังคับแก่การลงลายพิมพ์นิ้วมือ แกงได ตราประทับ หรือเครื่องหมายอื่นทำนองเช่นว่านั้น ซึ่งทำลงในเอกสารที่ทำต่อหน้าพนักงานเจ้าหน้าที่ มาตรา 10 เมื่อความข้อใดข้อหนึ่งในเอกสารอาจตีความได้สองนัยนัยไหนจะทำให้เป็นผลบังคับได้ ให้ถือเอาตามนัยนั้นดีกว่าที่จะถือเอานัยที่ไร้ผล มาตรา 11 ในกรณีที่มีข้อสงสัย ให้ตีความไปในทางที่เป็นคุณแก่คู่กรณีฝ่ายซึ่งจะเป็นผู้ต้องเสียในมูลหนี้นั้น

Using a cutting-edge technology called augmented reality, Pearson’s BouncePages app launches engaging, interactive video animations that bring textbook pages to life. Use your mobile device to snap a picture of the pre-tagged Pearson page, and an animation illustrating the page’s concept launches immediately. No slow websites or hard-to-remember logins required. And, in addition to these dynamic animations, many of the pages also include hands-on practice opportunities for students to directly apply what they just learned. BouncePages’ augmented reality technology transforms textbooks into convenient digital platforms, breathes life into your learning experience, and helps you grasp difficult academic concepts. Textbook learning will never be the same. Features: • Easy To Scan: Every page has been tested to ensure instant recognition and the immediate launch of the accompanying animation. • Engaging, Interactive, and Educational: The animations include friendly characters, entertaining scenarios, and effective explanations of the material. They allow students to go at their own pace and feature interactive math tools that let students practice what they just learned. • Straightforward and Relevant: The animations and practice opportunities use real-world situations to demonstrate the material in a way that students can easily relate to. • Hassle-Free: There’s no need to journey to the computer or create another online account that you’ll probably forget anyway. All you need is your book and your mobile device to launch the animations.
release_text: - Added support for 3D models in Pop Out mode. You can now rotate and zoom in to view models at any angle by swiping or rotating with two fingers.

description: Lag reduction for ROOT USERS ONLY! Many Android tasks run slower than they should for one simple, yet not-so-obvious reason: they consume large amounts of random data from a limited source. Random data is used to generate session keys and unique identifiers, in SSL and wifi, while starting processes, and during inter-process communication. This data (entropy) runs out frequently, and that causes processes reading from the blocking device (if any) to temporarily stop responding (lag). These processes cannot continue until the Linux kernel repopulates the entropy pool, which takes time. In addition, input events are pulled from the user interface (to refill the pool), which may also contribute to the problem. Seeder is a service for root users. It assists the kernel in "topping off" the entropy pool by re-seeding it with data from the non-blocking (high performance) random device. Optionally, it can also help alleviate MMC I/O contention by extending the I/O queue, allowing the I/O scheduler to make better decisions, and combine more writes. On some devices, applications load significantly faster (particularly large ones like Facebook, Chrome, and Youtube), and task switching becomes effortless. Fewer visual "hiccups" occur. You MUST be running a rooted device to use this application! If you don't know what this means, Seeder will probably not work on your device! ** Note ** This app does not increase raw performance, but rather eliminates some types of annoying lag (ie. applications briefly freezing, jerky scrolling, delays returning to the home screen, etc). The effect seems to be more noticeable the longer the device has been running prior to activating the RNG service. Google's efforts to optimize newer builds of Android have been substantial, and Seeder has less effect on Android 4.0+ (though many users still report improvement). Bug reports are greatly appreciated. If you have any trouble with the application, please send an email before leaving a review. If during testing you find that Seeder does not noticeably reduce lag on your device, please email me for a refund!
release_text: New RNG performance profiles: Light / Moderate / Aggressive (controls RNG seeding frequency). Moderate and aggressive modes may slightly increase battery usage if suspend-on-sleep is disabled. I/O queue extension increases MMC request queue size and expiry period, which helps reduce lag under heavy I/O. v2.0.0 - NEW: I/O queue extension - NEW: RNG power-saving control - NEW: RNG service performance profiles - FIXED: Root detection fails on some devices

If you want to learn Korean the first thing you must know and master is the Korean alphabet. This application will help you on this job with a selection of simple video tutorials. You will learn the all Korean letters with ease before getting started with the real language. It's totally free and very easy to use. Discover the Korean alphabet today.

Class Messenger is a private 2 way message service that keeps Teachers, Parents and Students in sync. This one app is for everyone to use whether they are a Teacher, Parent, Student or involved in school in any way. Please compare Class Messenger to any other messaging service and you'll find it the best suited for the classroom. Services that simply 'remind' are not enough. Features include: - Send pictures - Launch Surveys - Attach documents - Schedule messages to go when you want....and automatically repeat them - NEW Create Order Forms - NEW Parent to Parent messaging - NEW Intelligent messaging Send messages to everyone, to groups or to individual parents, other teachers or students. Everyone chooses whether they get messages in the app, via email, the website or even SMS messages. We even have blocking features for threads (if you don't want to hear about a particular discussion) or specific members. Also included in this app: 'Staffroom' which is a special kind of group for Teachers and Administration only to share private messages. Great for the whole staff of a school or for a small group (like all the Grade 4 teachers or all the elementary music teachers in a school board). Class Messenger is for Teachers, Parents and Students to use. This app is fully compatible with our web based version that you can access from any computer in the world so you never miss a thing. Class Messenger: in sync, effortlessly.

Train your voice and be a better singer. App plays a note or phrase of notes, and you sing to it. The piano keys highlight showing which note you should sing and which pitch you are correctly singing. Keep track of progress and gain stars for great singing. Designed in collaboration with professional singing teacher. Exercises to expand your vocal range. *** Sing the Note Game *** For beginners. Train your voice to sing in tune. Pitch training for singers. *** Sing the Phrase Game *** Series of levels and exercises to increase range and perfection. Interval training for singers. *** Hold the Pitch Challenge *** See how long you can hold a pitch. Scores are stored in Progress. *** Free Sing *** Sing and the keyboard will highlight to the appropriate pitch. Record your voice. Listen back. Play music and sing along. *** Interval Test *** Practice for your music grade exams. Can you sing the suggested interval? ***Vocal Range *** Series of exercises to expand your vocal range by relaxing your voice. *** NOTE *** Audio input required and due to microphones / microphone drivers not being standard, there are some devices which the app will not work well. Please inform the developers via email, so we can investigate and make a fix.

description: The first editions of the Journal of Discourses were published in England by George D. Watt, the stenographer of Brigham Young, in 1854. The 26 volume collection includes 1,438 sermons given by 55 church leaders, including Brigham Young, John Taylor, Parley P. Pratt, Heber C. Kimball, George A. Smith, Orson Pratt, Franklin D. Richards, Jedediah M. Grant, and others. The 26 volumes cover a wide range of topics such as celestial marriage, spiritual communication, fall and redemption of the earth, the personality of God, temples, and others. Bonus book! Lectures on Faith Lectures on Faith were published in the forepart of the Doctrine and Covenants in all editions from 1835 until 1921. Although the lectures are not currently published as part of the standard works, it is evident that they were held in high esteem by the Prophet Joseph Smith and those that followed him. President Joseph Fielding Smith said “These lectures are of great value and should be studied... I consider them to be of extreme value in the study of the gospel of Jesus Christ,” Bruce R. McConkie has classified the lectures as “some of the best lesson material ever prepared on the Godhead; on the character, perfections, and attributes of God; on faith, miracles, and sacrifice. They can be studied with great profit by all scholars.” The seven lectures in this collection deal with the following subjects: What is faith? What is the role of revelation in developing faith? What are the attributes of God? Why is it necessary to have a correct knowledge about God's attributes in order to exercise true faith? What is the true nature of the Godhead and what is God's purpose for man? What is the role of sacrifice in building the faith needed for eternal life? What are the effects or results that flow from having true faith? The compilation contains: A historical sketch by John A. Widstoe. A treatise on true faith by Orson Pratt. A bibliography on Melchizedek by Ariel L. Crowley.
release_text: Added volumes 2 through 26. Added Lectures on Faith, which includes a historical sketch by John A. Widstoe, a treatise on true faith by Orson Pratt, and a bibliography on Melchizedek by Ariel L. Crowley. Improved navigation and user interface.

description: The greatest genius of all time, Nikola Tesla, in his own words. The chapters in this book were originally written by Nikola Tesla as a series of six articles in "The Electrical Experimenter" magazine in 1919 (February through June, and October issues). Nikola Tesla had the remarkable ability to design and troubleshoot his complex inventions to the minutest detail all in his mind. He has been called the "Master of Lighting" and the "Father of Alternating Current" and is the inventor of the induction motor, the alternator and the resonant circuit (which would later allow Marconi to build the radio). Born to Serbian parents on July 9, 1856 in the village of Smiljan (modern-day Croatia), his childhood dream was to harness the power of the Niagara Falls. In 1896, thirty years after telling his uncle that he would do so, the city of Buffalo was powered with his system. The world's first alternating current electrical plant was a success! Thomas Edison, who had vehemently opposed Tesla's alternating current system ended up changing his systems to Tesla's. Shortly before he died, Edison said that his biggest mistake had been in trying to develop direct current, rather than the superior alternating current system that Tesla had put within his grasp. In 1888, Tesla's discovery that a magnetic field could be made to rotate, made possible the invention of the AC induction motor. The major advantage of this motor being its brushless operation, which at the time many believed impossible. In fact, when Tesla was studying in college he explained his idea to one of his professors. The professor then went on to "prove" to the class that what Tesla proposed was impossible. Needless to say, Tesla proved him wrong. While doing research on high-voltage and high frequency electricity and wireless communication in his New York laboratory, Tesla at one point created an earthquake which shook the ground for several miles around. Many of Tesla's great discoveries, such as the wireless transmission of alternating current, are still a mystery for the scientific world today. Wireless electricity distribution was one of Tesla's most important demonstrations, and consisted in lighting two hundred lamps at a distance of 26 miles from a transmitter coil in Colorado Springs. After the Colorado Spring experiments, at the end of 1898, Tesla returned to New York and his friend Robert Underwood, editor of Century magazine, invited him to write an article on the problems of the energy of the future. In his article for Century, he stated that burning oil to produce electricity was barbaric and utterly wrong, adding that, with his discovery of transmitting electricity through the earth's magnetic field, it was possible to cover all electrical needs. Mankind is in debt with Tesla. May this book spark you, the reader, with the energy that captivated the mind of the greatest genius of all time. Bonus: Tesla's lecture on AC Experiments!

U+ 고객이라면 데이터 요금 걱정없이 무료! * 단, 데이터 로밍 이용 중에는 이용이 불가합니다. ■ 청구서가 오기 전까지 지난달 사용 요금이 궁금하셨죠? - 예상 청구금액 실시간 확인 가능 ■ 소액결제 사기, 각종 스미싱 피해로부터 고객님을 지켜드립니다. - 차단/차단해제 - 한도관리 - 이용내역 조회 - 비밀번호 설정/해제 - 결제업체 연락처 등 상세정보 확인 ■ 언제 어디서나 통신요금을 신용카드로 즉시 납부할 수 있습니다. [주요기능] 1. 휴대폰은 물론, 홈 상품(인터넷/TV/070) 요금 및 청구서 조회 2. 휴대폰 요금제 및 부가서비스 신청/변경 3. 기본제공 잔여량 및 실시간 요금 확인 4. 소액결제 차단/차단해제 및 이용내역 확인 5. 모바일/홈 상품 약정정보 확인 6. 글로벌로밍 조회 7. 가까운 직영점 찾기 8. 자주하는 질문 찾기 ---- 개발자 연락처 : 서울시 용산구 한강대로 32 (주)LG유플러스 +82-1544-0010

description: ◈ 사용상 주의사항 U+ 내비서는 LG U+ 고객만을 위한 유료 부가서비스 입니다. 한 달 간의 무료 사용 기간을 제공해 드리며, 이후 가입 없이는 서비스 이용이 불가합니다. 한 달간 충분히 사용해 보신 후 가입을 원하시면 APP(앱) 내 설정 메뉴 > 가입하기를 진행해주세요! app_name: TeX Writer - LaTeX On the Go
description: Writing paper on your Android device! TeX Writer lets you write, compile and pre­view TeX documents right on your tablet or smartphone, and no internet connection is re­quired. Editing TeX is now super easy with the assistant keybar. Comparing to other text editors, it saves you a lot of time in typing LaTeX commands. - Plain TeX + Full LaTeX (based on pdftex engine). - Minimal distribution. Missing packages are downloaded on demand. - No root required. - No internet connection required except to download missing packages. - Autorun BibTeX and MakeIndex. - PDF output. Please install your favorite pdf viewer, for example Adobe PDF reader, to preview the output. - Syntax highlighting text editor. - Assistant keyboard for typing frequently used keys - Dropbox syncing - Language packages: CJK (Chinese/Japanese), Russian Basic OS Requirement: Android 2.3+ Dropbox Sync: Android 4.0+
release_text: v1.6.4: - Fix UI issues for 10inch tablets v1.6.3: - Fix crash problem for x86 tablets

Take a look below at everything you can do: - Comes pre-populated with over 530 items - Add/Delete Lists - Duplicate Old Lists so you don't have to start over - Add New Tasks - Add New Items - Delete Unwanted Items - Set Alarms to remind yourself of items you still need to do - Add Notes for more clarification - Set a Priority to items (High, Medium, Low) - Edit the Names of Items - Sort Your Lists Alphabetically or by Priority (Menu Item) kw: check, check list, to do, things, stuff, need, want, die, death, end, life

Our quizzes, flash cards, and a dictionary of over 450+ Cosmetology terms makes the perfect study partner. This handy Android app from Little Apps keeps your user interface simple and straightforward; the only complex aspect of this app is the content itself. The Cosmetology Quiz (Flash Cards & Dictionary), made for students on the go with Android phones, applies a simple, easy-to-use structure to a particularly rich and amazing subject.

"Baby white noises & lullabies" provides everything you need to help your baby relax and sleep better! This includes various white noise sounds such as TV noise,hair dryer,vacuum cleaner,rainfall,ocean wave,water stream and shh sound. These will help your baby relax and better sleep. ━━━━━━━━━━━ Features ━━━━━━━━━━━ 1.Soothing your baby with various white noise sounds. - White noise sound - TV noise - Hair dryer - Vacuume clear - Rainfall - Ocean wave - shh sound - Water stream - and lullabies - Sound shutoff timer (fades volume to silence) 2. Peek-a-boo time with cute characters! - 7 cute characters are provided. - You can choose auto mode or manual mode. 3.Sweet and ambient lullabies for baby and parents. 4.Focus on play - Black/white and color baby focus images are supported. - You can choose auto mode or manual mode. ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ Multitasking and Retina display support ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ○ Full Background audio support! WHY BABIES LOVE WHITE NOISE? Babies love white noise. Let’s start with looking at it from baby’s perspective. They’ve just spent their entire life in the womb. And the womb is deafeningly loud. It is just slightly less loud than a lawnmower. Loud is normal to a baby. Life outside the womb is uncomfortably quiet. White noise sounds like “home” to a baby. All babies, ALL, should have loud white noise when they sleep all the time until they are at least 1. White noise is hands down the most effective, easiest to implement, inexpensive sleep aid for babies. It is also the sleep aid that parents most frequently DON’T use or they don’t use it CORRECTLY. I’ve had parents tell me they don’t want to use white noise because they are afraid their baby will become addicted. Or they don’t want to have to invest in a $70 white noise machine from the Sharper Image catalog. Or they think they are using white noise, but whatever device they are using barely makes enough noise to drown out a library whisper (yes I’m talking about you sleepy sheep – these don’t work, please don’t buy one). White noise is hands-down the best and easiest thing you can use to help you and your baby sleep better. - White noise reduces stress in babies. - White noise helps babies sleep. - White noise helps babies cry less. - White noise reduces the risk of SIDS. - White noise will help YOU sleep. - White noise is easy to wean off of. HELP US MAKE IT BETTER! We want to hear your feedback! Please send us your suggestions via email. support@littlegeniusmobile.com or visit our web site. www.littlegeniusmobile.com
release_text: Increased time of white noise duration ( up to 8 hours)

description: Knock-knock jokes are boring when you just listen to a recording. With this app you get to answer "Who's there?" and "___ who?" with every joke! And the app will understand you! This voice-activated knock-knock joke app is fun for all ages and includes 20 fully interactive jokes. Kids will love having the phone respond to their voice and they'll have fun wow-ing their friends with this app. Feel free to try the lite version first. It's free and includes the first 6 jokes of the full version. If you like it, come on back and buy the full version! How can you pass up an offer like that? Knock-knock. Who's there? Awesome. Awesome who? Awesome app that you'll love! A couple of notes. The app is in American English and the jokes are clean and fun for the kids. There is a little delay before the microphone pops up for you to talk, but you'll get used to it. Check out the video below for a demo of what to expect. Make sure the volume is on (not just the ringer volume, but the app volume). The first time you launch the Google Voice Recognition, it might ask you a couple of questions, but after that, the app will run smoothly. The app needs Internet connectivity for Google voice recognition and to check the license. Please email me if you have any questions or concerns or if you want to tell me you love the app! info@littlepancake.com
release_text: 1.2: Keep the screen in portrait mode. 1.1: Fixed screen 'going to sleep' during joke. Removed dependency on Internet access. Maintained hilarity! 1.0: Initial Release!

description: PROFIT Calculate the profit for your Bitcoin, Litecoin, Namecoin and a lot of other altcoins. See below for the supported coins. ALARMS (After a donation) Set alarms and get notifications for your total profit and/or crypto currency rate/value/profit. These alarms can also be selected in Tasker via: state -> plugin. HOW IT WORKS Fill in how many BTC, LTC, NMC, etc. you have and the price you've paid for it. The app calculates your profit using the API of some exchanges (see below for the full list). The fee is considered in this calculation. The prices shown are the prices for which you can sell your coins. It is also possible to show your profit in bitcoins, to do so you need to fill in the price of one bitcoin at the moment you bought your alternate coin (the third input field). To make the app easier to use, the values you enter are stored. You can also view the history of your last 100 profits. To keep out the average user that borrows your phone from viewing your profit, you can now set a password as a simple protection. Adds can be removed with a donation via in-app purchase or crypto currency. The supported currencies for buy/rate/value and profit are: - USD - EUR (from Btc-e, Bitstamp or MtGox) - BTC - AUD - CAD - EUR (from regular exchange) - GBP - RUB The supported exchanges are: - ANX (anxbtc.com) - Btc-e (btc-e.com) - Bter (bter.com) - Coinbase (coinbase.com) - Crypto-Trade (crypto-trade.com) - Cryptsy (cryptsy.com) - Poloniex (poloniex.com) - Kraken (kraken.com) - Vircurex (vircurex.com) Below is an incomplete list, a full list can be found at http://www.liuto-apps.com/app_page/bitcoin.html#supported - description: When you start drinkin', just put up your beacon! Select friends and they will see your location. Find out where others are who want you to know they are drinkin'. Your beacon will stay up until you take it down, so no more checking in when you're moving the party from spot to spot. You'll never wonder where the party is when you've got this app.

Love Liverpool? Then you’ll love our new, free, Liverpool Echo app - keeping you in touch with all the latest local news. Free to download, our app gives you all the very latest news, sport, entertainment and features around the clock. On our new app you’ll never be more than a click away from the latest headlines and biggest exclusives about events in our region. If you’re an Everton or Liverpool fan, our app gives you instant access to the latest developments at the club which matters to you, with updates from the writers who have the inside track week in, week out. Features and comments which get people talking are also included in our app, along with a what’s on section which makes it easy for you to make sure you don’t miss the events you want to see in and around Liverpool. With picture galleries, videos and other interactive features, you’ll never more than a quick swipe away from being up to date with life in Liverpool. And you can also make sure it’s your Liverpool you get to see with out ‘My Liverpool homepage, a fantastic addition which allows you to customise the content the way YOU want to see it, when YOU want to see it. Share and post your favourite articles to your friends and family via Facebook, Twitter or Email. - Free to download - Offline reading for all articles - 24/7 breaking Liverpool news stories - Image galleries - Videos - Live Blogging on big stories and sports events

Housing’s real estate and property search app makes finding a home to buy or rent easier than ever! You can find an apartment to rent, select a PG/hostel, get that perfect flatmate or roommate, buy a new property, post a flat for sale, find the right tenant and look up new localities. Now even more easy to use, our real estate app lets you see homes across India with multiple full-colour photographs! Go beyond just a basic property search - explore the neighbourhood showing you unique lifestyle ratings, schools, amenities and more. You can rest assured everything is posted and photographed by us. What can you do on the Housing.com real estate app? ✓ NEW! FLATMATES WITH CHAT! - Post details of your flat and find new flatmates to share a home - Chat with potential roommates right from the app without sharing your contact - Connect to fellow seekers and find a new home together - Type in your locations & start browsing through photos for every verified property ✓ BUY FLATS, APARTMENTS, VILLAS, NEW PROJECTS & MORE: - Explore tonnes of home listings for sale - Use Intelligent Search filters - Explore your neighborhood - see bus stops, schools, malls, restaurants and more! - Check out lots of New Projects across India - Explore the EMI calculator to assist you on loan information ✓ RENT APARTMENTS, INDEPENDENT HOUSES & FIND PG/HOSTELS: - Browse only 100% verified listings - See 1RK, 1, 2 ,3+ BHK apartments/flats and houses without brokerage - Real property pictures - Find Shared Accommodation with Map-based search ✓ SELL YOUR PROPERTY - List your property for rent, sale or paying guest for FREE - Take advantage of our unique, 1-click listing service - Get a Photo Shoot of your property - Receive Convenient customer support - Attract Genuine leads ✓ Lifestyle Ratings - Wondering how the neighbourhood fares? See ratings of the best localities to stay in, with commute distances and times to & from airports, essential information like nearby schools, restaurants, hospitals, movie theatres and grocery stores on a map. ✓ LOTS of Data – Get every detail you need, with dozens of data points collected and analysed by our Data Science Team, from floor plans and photo galleries, to intelligent locality ratings. ✓ ONE-CLICK Listing Process: Landlords, owners, agents: Have the Housing team do everything for you. We’ll come to you to snap photos, gather information, and post the listing. ✓ Search YOUR way: Add filters like budget, neighbourhood, number of beds and more, to customize your real estate search. Narrow it down even more, with specifics such as sofas, TVs, AC, pools, parking and gas. ✓ Map View: Instantly see nearby homes to live, or PG/Hostels to stay, with options to share, shortlist or get alerts! ✓ More Listings, Daily: Our dedicated Housing team adds properties daily so you have enough choice to power your property searches! ✓ Stay in the Know: Receive personalised Alerts and get notified when listings that meet your search criteria are are added. ✓ Vivid Interior Photos: Scroll through vivid, full-screen interior photos of homes. ✓ Shortlists: Save your favourite homes to easily refer back to them. ✓ Accessible anytime: Find your shortlists & personalized alerts across all your devices. ✓ Share Homes you Love: Look up houses and share listings with your network. ✓ Many Cities: Find a home in Mumbai, Bangalore, Delhi, Pune, and many more! ✓ Connect instantly: Directly reach out to real estate owners, landlords and agents, from the app! The Housing real estate app is an easy, enjoyable way to get all the property details you need, on the go. Lookup, and live better! We’d love to hear your feedback: Email us anytime at support@housing.com

Easy Converters Free is an easy way to convert units with your phone. The app has a lot of converters and there are groups of converters from where you can select a converter. In the application you can search for a unit or a converter, it has the option to show all the conversions on one screen and you can change the "from unit" by touching the unit that you want to be the start unit. There is no button to calculate, the converter gives you the conversion on the fly when you add numbers. You can set the numbers of decimals you want to see in the result. It has these converters: Acceleration Angle Area Distances (Length) Data size Data Transfer Rate RF Power Energy Flow Force Frequency Fuel Consumption Light Moment of Force (Torque) Number Base Power Pressure Radioactivity Rainfall Sound Level Speed (Velocity) Temperature Time Weight Viscosity Volume / Capacity / Cooking Electricity Consumption Electric Charge Linear Charge Density Surface Charge Density Volume Charge Density Electric Current Linear Current Density Surface Current Density Electric Field Strength Electric Potential and Voltage Electrical Resistance Electrical Resistivity Electrical Conductance Electrical Conductivity Capacitance Inductance Metric Prefixes Let me know if you have questions or you need a new converter which is not in my converter. Thank you for taking a look on my app.

description: The Faster Than Light Launcher, Pro Edition Make no mistake, this is the fastest launcher you'll ever run. Small, light, configurable. The Gingerbread launcher as it should have been. No useless stuff, no compromises. Performance and usability are the driving forces here. On version 3.0 Pro users have a all new game to play now: The Pro version can use existing ADW, GoLauncher and LauncherPro Icon and Dock themes, giving FTL and unprecedented array of possible theming. You can even mix Dock and Icon themes from different launchers. Google Play is yours for the take. And of course you still have the other extras: configurable homsecreen grid from 4x4 to 6x6, resizeable widgets, and, never seen in any launcher: control over core Android window animation speed. Important: FTL supports all resolutions and ICS, but only 800x480, 854x480, 960x540 and 480x320 devices have 3D drawer enabled! Also ICS has no 3D drawer because it does not contain the "old" opengl interface. But as it is natively accelerated anyway, 2D drawer should be very fast. Features: - Theming support: The Pro version can use existing ADW, GoLauncher and LauncherPro Icon and Dock themes, giving FTL and unprecedented array of possible theming. - Tweaked for extreme speed and smoothness - Fully accelerated 3D Waterfall app drawer - Option to use "normal" 2D app drawer - Configurable support for resizeable widgets: only when adding them to the homescreen, you cannot edit them later. - Configurable Homescreen grid: From 4 to 6 rows, and 4 to 6 columns - Configurable number of homescreens: from 1 to 9 with configurable default homescreen - Choice between 3 and 5 icon Dock - Configurable Dock icons size - Configurable "swipe down" and "swipe down" independently to any of the following: *show homescreen previews *open app drawer *hide status bar *show and hide status bar *open and close dock bar - Includes anim speed: precise control over core Android windows/transition animation speed - Configurable Support for launcher auto-rotation - Configurable Infinite looping of homescreens - Configurable support for scrollable widgets - Configurable bounce effect on homescreen transitions - Configurable wallpaper scrolling - Configurable transition speed of homescreens Basic Instructions: - On first boot, homescreens will be empty. Long-press anywhere and start adding stuff! - You can add/change the shortcuts on the dock bar: Long-press the place you want, and wait for the a popup to show, allowing you to choose what activity you want there. - You can uninstall apps directly from the homescreen: long press the shortcut (even in the app drawer), drag it to the trash can that appears where the dock was. If you drop it immediately FTL will only remove the shortcut, but if you wait a bit before droping, FTL will offer to uninstall the app. Try it, you won't regret it!

description: Functional or taping bandages (taping English) are techniques bandages, consistent and made of elastic or inelastic orthosis, by tape or tapes tapes, for the treatment of musculoskeletal injuries. The bandage is called functional because it limits the joint, in a particular movement, but allows other joint ranges of motion, allowing the injured function, in turn enhancing the inflammatory process. The wide variety of taping techniques used in joints such as the shoulder, elbow, wrist, fingers, ankle, knee. Also for muscle problems, such as bandages discharge, shortening, etc. . . From my experience as a professional nurse propose this application as a means to popularize and extend the use of the most common functional bandages , explaining step by step and very illustrative manner, pretending to be a support tool for professionals ( therapists , doctors, nurses / as) in their daily clinical practice. The application is configured similarly to an "electronic book" or "e -book " with functioning Web-based navigation, but does NOT need internet connection to function. Reading each page is done by moving vertically with your finger, as in any web page. To turn the page you can move your finger horizontally and use the keypad to the top of the screen. Clicking on a picture you can access a full screen view of it, where you can "zoom” to see the details. This application includes a general introduction to the taping , explaining the why aspects of biomechanics, types of techniques, indications, contraindications and basic elements , further including the detailed explanation of all the techniques of bandages series: - BANDAGE FUNCTIONAL ANKLE: elastic taping the ankle with edema, inelastic taping and taping the ankle joint. - FUNCTIONAL WRIST BANDAGE. - BANDAGE FUNCTIONAL FINGER : immobilization of the second and third hand fingers ( syndactyly ) , limitation of abduction of the thumb , bandage for sprains of the collateral ligaments of the interphalangeal joint and bandage the finger joint 2nd to 5th - FUNCTIONAL KNEE BANDAGE. - FUNCTIONAL ELBOW BANDAGE. Definitely TAPING PRO is the ideal application since gathered all bandaging techniques in a single app at a great price.

Не знаете как произносится какое-либо слово? Это приложение поможет запомнить ударения в словах, которые часто бывают произнесены неправильно. Приложение предоставляет на выбор бесконечный режим тренировки, либо тест с определенным количеством слов. Также имеется встроенный орфоэпический словарик и возможность уточнения ударения в интернете. Отлично подходит школьникам и студентам, которые сдают ЕГЭ по русскому языку (задание A1). Теги: образование, русский язык, ударения, егэ. Do not know how to pronounce any word? This application can help you remember the stress in words that are often spoken correctly. The application provides a choice of endless training mode, or test a certain number of words. There is also a built-in pronouncing dictionary and the ability to verify the stress on the Internet. Excellent schoolchildren and students who pass the exam in Russian language (task A1). Tags: education, Russian language, accent, CSE.

ANOTHER ANDROID FIRST! Your android tablets, phablets or phones can now be used throughout the whole family! Just download this app to take a sneak preview at whats coming up in the next version of android! Whats coming up? MULTIPLE USERS thats what! You now have the ability in android to create different user for your whole family, keeping your data hidden under your individual lock screens. What does UserManager do for me? UserManager allows you to create and manage these users in a user friendly way that Google have not yet created. With UserManager you can: -Create new users -Remove users -Hide users -Rename users -Format users -Switch users -Disable apps individually for each user What if my kids open this app? You can choose to hide this UserManager from each user individually making UserManager a family friendly applications. What does UserManager Require? -Root access -Busybox (The newer the better!) -Android 4.1.X (JellyBean) or higher!
release_text: Multiple users is blocked on some devices. Custom roms should have it unlocked. 1.0.8 * Fixes for android 4.2 error where same user is displayed twice 1.0.7 * Changed the main settings dialog to Swipe view + Title strip * Users Are easier to manage * Two panels are now created for tablets and some large phones * Added options to manually choose if tablet lauputs are used * Removed Warning dialog for 4.2+ * More effective settings are now used for hiding UserManager * Minor bug fixes and tweaks

description: Presenting an African Birds Sounds compilation app with high quality sounds and songs of birds found in Africa! Featuring the African Emerald Cuckoo,Black, White Casqued Hornbill, Black Throated Apalis Yellow Longbill and many more birds! Bird Sounds can be played by tapping on a bird picture. All sounds can be saved as Ringtones, Notifications and Alarms by long pressing on a bird and selecting the relevant option. Birds can be grouped by family or alphabetical order (with and without headings) using the Menu Settings. A Birdwatching checklist is included allowing you to tick off birds you have seen. Tapping on a bird on the checklist screen allows you to view more information about the bird on Wikipedia or perform an image search via Google images. Personal Lists can be created too! Create a list of your favorite birds, or add birds that you've seen on a recent bird watching trip. Birds can be added to your lists from the checklist screen. Mini games are also included helping you to learn the different birds found in this app: Guess the Picture, Guess the Sound and Guess the Name. There are no ads present in this app. Permissions are required for saving birds sounds. All images and sounds used are royalty free. If you have any questions, requests or suggestions, just send an Email or Tweet us and we'll happily respond :)
release_text: Personal Lists have been added! You can now create your own lists within this app. Updated the birds menu from the checklist screen. Links to more bird recordings and sonograms for each bird have been added.

description: The official Portes du Soleil application makes you the master of our French-Swiss ski area... On offer to all visitors from the International Association of the Portes du Soleil, this new application contains everything you could possibly need to know about our cross-border ski network: an interactive piste map detailing slopes that are open, skiers’ GPS location on the slopes in real time, the weather forecast and snow conditions, restaurants on the slopes, webcams, emergency numbers and other useful information. You can also watch the best film clips about the ski area and browse the events diary. Weather forecasts and piste/ski lift opening and closing times are provided by the ski resorts within the Portes du Soleil. GPS positioning is indicative only. Charges may vary depending on your mobile phone operator and location within the French-Swiss ski area. The application was developed by Skiplan, the specialists in providing mobile phone information for skiers. Continue use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery level.
release_text: - Added a summer version of most cotents (you can go back to the winter version in the app settings) - The timestamp of the last webcam image is now displayed - Minor improvements of the interface and app ergonomy

description: Jump! Double Jump! From out of the litter box and into your heart, Nano the Cat is a frustratingly amusing platform jumping game that takes inspiration from the dreaded continuous scrolling levels in early Mario games. You control Nano, a strange kitty with a crooked tail, as she tears through the apartment in a tuna-and-catnip-fueled frenzy. Jump from this thing to that. Don't fall because the floor is lava! (not really) ‣ Great graphics ‣ Simple and addictive gameplay ‣ Achievements ‣ Leaderboard ‣ Backgrounds change with time of day ‣ Real cat sounds Premium Version features: ‣ Remove ads ‣ New random menu art ‣ Nano love achievement ‣ Support developer ‣ Buy nano cat food ---------------------------------------- In-App Purchase Explanation: The Premium Version does not confer any gameplay advantages. Premium features are all aesthetic or functionally separate from the core gameplay experience. Every player is on equal ground! Explanation of Permissions: ‣ Internet - Google Play Games Service & Facebook (both optional) ‣ Access Network State - Google Play Games Service & Facebook (both optional) ‣ Billing - For purchase of Premium Version (optional)

Uygulamamız güncel olmayan arşiv verileri içerdiğinden ötürü, reklamlar kaldırılmıştır. 2013-2014 YGS/LYS üniversite sınavı için ÖSYM'nin 25.07.2013 tarihinde yayınlamış olduğu üniversite taban puanları bilgilerini içeren arşiv uygulamadır. ÖSYM'nin güncel verilerini içeren doküman 23.07.2014 tarihinde yayınlanmış olup, dilerseniz bu verileri içeren yeni uygulamamızı da edinebilirsiniz. 2013-2014 arşiv verilerine göre ilgili dönemin; bütün yüksek öğretim programlarını; üniversite bazında, bölüm bazında, puan türü bazında ve şehir bazında ayrı ayrı inceleyebilirsiniz. Uygulama içerisinde 2 yıllık önlisans ve 4 yıllık lisans programlarını ayrı ayrı görüntülersiniz. Bu tercihinizi yaptıktan sonra dilediğiniz yüksek öğretim programının; Program Kodu, Üniversite, Bölüm, Puan Türü, Kontenjan, Taban Puan, Tavan Puan, Şehir verilerine, sıralama ve filtreleme seçenekleri ile birlikte ulaşırsınız. Seçtiğiniz arama türüne göre listelediğiniz bölümleri taban puanlarına göre artan/azalan şekilde sıralayabilir ve eğer isterseniz listelenen sonuçları İkinci Öğretim, İngilizce, Ücretli, Tam Burslu, %25 Burslu, %50 Burslu, %75 Burslu seçeneklerine göre filtreleyebilirsiniz. ÖSYM tarafından 2013 YGS ve 2013 LYS sonrası yayınlanmış dokümanlardaki bütün veriler uygulamayı yüklediğinizde telefonunuza veritabanı olarak kurulur ve siz bu veritabanı üzerinden dilediğiniz yüksek öğretim programının güncel olmayan arşiv bilgilerine ulaşırsınız. Uygulamayı telefonunuza bir defa kurduktan sonra, Internet bağlantısına ihtiyaç duymadan işlemlerinizi yürütebilirsiniz. Uygulama içindeki filtreleme seçeneği aramalarınızı daraltmanızda size yardımcı olacaktır. Örneğin özel üniversitede tam burslu okumak isteyen bir aday, arama sonuçlarına göre listelediği üniversitelerin ilgili bölümlerini Filtreleme butonuna tıklayarak Tam Burslu seçeneğini seçtikten sonra yalnızca tam burslu programları listeleyebilecektir. Ya da İngilizce eğitimi almayı mutlaka isteyen bir aday, arama sonuçlarını Filtreleme butonuna tıklayarak İngilizce seçeneğini seçtikten sonra filtreleyebilecek ve yalnızca İngilizce programları görebilecektir. Güncel verileri içeren diğer uygulamamız, sizlerden gelecek öneriler doğrultusunda güncellenmeye ve geliştirilmeye devam edecektir. Herkese başarılar ve kolaylıklar diliyoruz. description: _ Did you notice that from the moment you bought a brand new car you can see the same model all around? It's simple. If your mind is concentrated on something, it is more aware of the same things around you. Thanks to this application, you can keep your mind being concentrated on success, love or money and so it will miss no possibility or opportunity that may arise. Successful people are those who see the opportunities... How does it work? Download and install the application. You can change settings according to your preferences. The application will be running in the background and from time to time it will show up a short subliminal message with a high impact on your mind. You may notice it or not but your mind will. Be patient, it will need some time to transform your mind in a highly successful device. Do not lose faith, stay positive and go for your goals! Why is the application paid? It's simple! It works much better this way. Why? We put only little or no value on things we get for free and so does our mind. Paid application will unlock more power of your mind because your mind values it higher. LATEST UPDATE: We have completely rewrote code for showing messages! FINALLY, you can change message duration and font size!  Features: - topics: Success, Money, Love, Business, Overcoming tough time - you can create your own messages via http://subliminal.lwiglobal.com - does not disturb or bother - works anywhere - in apps, games, etc. - more than 1.500 subliminal messages with high impact - colored boxes fit every mood and situation - tested with psychologists - results in less than 2 months of only using your phone - works across all phones and tablets - you can change message duration - you can change font size Stories: "Many thanks you! It's a lovely app! I have a G2 on Android OS 2.3.4. I appreciate your diligent effort to have 4 categories containing 1500 positive messages, that is very beneficial and helpful." [C. Owens] "I tried this awesome application and in two weeks I started to feel different. I wasn't afraid any more, I started to be more active and finally met the girl of my dreams." [Mike, Beta testing - love]

description: Tropical island, live wallpaper. Island in the ocean around the crystal clear water on a clear sky floating clouds. In the settings you can select the day or night, and one of the three islands to choose from. You can also set auto mode to detect day or night, the day will be from 8AM to 9PM.

Dashly is a real-time Magento Mobile Dashboard and Admin app for Android Phones & Tablets. It lets you connect to your Magento Store on mobile phones and tablets and get live access to all the vital store information such as Sales, Revenue, Invoice and Shipment information. You can also connect with any number of magento stores from your app. Best of all there is NO NEED for any coding. Anyone can simply install this app by creating an API user in your magento store. There is a helpful guide with screenshots to show how an API User and role can be created. Key Features & Benefits: -Keep track of all the vital sales & product metrics in a simple yet intuitive dashboard in real-time wherever you are. Get detailed information about each aspect of your e-commerce business by tapping the relevant widget. For example, if you want to know your revenue trend, just tap on the revenue widget and you can see the month till date revenue chart. -You can take a closer look at each order to know who placed the order and what were the items purchased within 2 taps. -Dashly provides a quick look at the orders that are pending and which need your attention. If you choose to, you can simply generate an invoice or process a shipment, or even hold the order, directly from your mobile. -You also receive automatic notifications on your mobile or tablet if a purchase is made or a certain product goes out of stock. The notification feature is especially useful during the holiday season as you would want to ensure that your popular products are in stock. -You can add multiple magento stores targeting different geographies. Note: -NO Plug in required.
release_text: -It support latest version 1.9.0 . -Implemented Scroll View. -Implemented Revenue Details. -Modified Orders & Product details. -Fixed small errors and design

description: Financial and Banking Terms is a comprehensive offline financial dictionary with 3500+ terms around every area of Finance, Stock and Mutual funds, Banking & Accounting, Investment banking & Trading, Risk management, Marketing & Advertising etc. Play interactive finance quizzes, save terms which you often use and a lot of exciting features in this educational app. Download now to improve your financial literacy with this Financial and Banking Terms. Learn the most commonly used terms in finance, business and the stock market. Main features: *Stock Watch: Keep a close watch on your stocks with Stock Watch. *Amortization: Calculate the time span of your loan/mortgage with Amortization. *Play finance quizzes around the different areas of finance *Providing entire financial bibliography just at your fingertips is the aim of this Financial Terms Dictionary. * Quick reference with financial graphs, charts and financial formulas * Hear audio pronunciations of every financial term(s) with just a tap with our financial dictionary. The soothing Interface sets your mood to start learning today. Financial dictionary is an app that enables the user to gain and upgrade their knowledge on following subjects: Stock & Mutual funds Banking Accounting Fixed Income & Derivatives Investment Banking & Trading Risk Management Statistics & Technical analysis General Finance Forex & Precious Metals Marketing & Advertising Economics Insurance & Annuities Real Estate Taxation Estate Corporate & Corporate Finance Legal & Policies So what are you waiting for. Install now to gain access to unlimited financial terms with Financial and Banking Terms.
release_text: * New feature "Currency Converter" added. * Pleasing new user interface to enhance your experience. * New terms added.

developer: Edutainment Ventures- Making Games People Play
description: Are you a non-native English language speaker wishing to enroll in universities using English as the medium of communication? Practice now with MUST have English words for your TOEFL ibt preparation. This feature rich android app for TOEFL test includes reading, listening, speaking & writing exercises through quizzes and games to score high in TOEFL test. Unlike other apps which give you mundane flashcards to cram for TOEFL ibt preparation. Start your TOEFL test practice today by using this app which will change the way to learn and practice for any English as a foreign language exam. Be it for TOEFL iBT test, TOEFL iTP test or TOEFL Junior test. Build a strong vocabulary with synonyms, antonyms, etymology and usage of words. Practice better with interactive games like Scramble, Match It and Army of Synonyms. Play quiz and score better with every attempt to score the best in TOEFL ibt preparation. Main Features: (new feature added) Homonyms- New series of Homonyms added to quiz. Now elevate your learning. Free TOEFL iBT practice for reading, listening, speaking. Staples feature allows you to add your most practiced words of English vocabulary. Potpourri gives you every field of a particular word like meaning, synonym, antonym etc. in one table. Revise & practice for the quizzes you have played to enhance your memory. Clues are included in every game to help you for your TOEFL test practice. Prepare to be baffled with our Jumbled Sentences. Challenge yourself further with our Passage Construction.
release_text: * 1000 new terms added. * UI modified for better user experience. * Minor bugs fixed.

description: 3 International Grandmasters invite you to develop your chess skills with selected daily chess problems. Choose a problem, Try to solve it by dragging and dropping pieces, and be helped. Get a new problem every day ! This is a free and first version so please feedback so as to improve it.
release_text: 1.4 version corrected crash on startup from previous 1.3 version
